Sporty maxi dress with archival design.Make a statement without sacrificing comfort with the adidas Adicolor Classics 3-Stripes Maxi Dress. The soft cotton blend single jersey fabric allows for effortless comfort in a dress that's cut to hug the body. A V-neck and 3-Stripes along the sleeves add a sporty vibe. Perfect for everyday casual wear that ensures your style is always on point.

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future. 

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products, however, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source." 

Find out more here: bettercotton.org/learnmore

name: Pride Dress (Plus Size)
description:
An adidas x Rich Mnisi pride dress made in part with a blend of recycled and renewable materials.Let love be your legacy. South African designer Rich Mnisi once wrote that reminder in a handwritten letter to his younger queer self, and today it thrives at the core of the adidas x Rich Mnisi Pride Collection. A celebration of self-expression, imagination and the unwavering belief that love unites, the collaboration explores fluidity, color and patterns. This partnership is one part of our effort to honor the LGBTQIA+ community alongside our Global Purpose partners, Athlete Ally and Stonewall UK.

Stand out exactly as you are. The bold play of geometric shapes on this adidas dress lets you do just that, pairing high-contrast colors with a modern silhouette. A ribbed crewneck with quarter zip keeps comfort right up front. 

A minimum of 70% of this product is a blend of recycled and renewable materials.

color: Halo Green S21 / Halo Green S21

name: Power AEROREADY One-Piece Suit
description:
A stretchy short bodysuit made to rethink our materials.When you're going for a PR, you don't let anything get in your way — no distractions, just pure focus. Pure comfort, too, when you're in this adidas one-piece suit. Soft and stretchy, it's built with an innovative material made from captured carbon emissions. Bonded power mesh around the waist plus elastic on the sides deliver support without compression. Cutouts flatter your shape, and a lined gusset reduces chafing. The racerback lets you move without restriction, and AEROREADY handles moisture before you even notice it's there. 

For this product we turned to a greenhouse gas technology. It uses captured industrial emissions as a new material feedstock. CO2 is fermented into ethanol which constitutes 30% by weight of a polyester yarn. We knitted this yarn into various products and now this carbon-based ethanol makes up a minimum of 15% by weight of this garment. With the help of innovation, we are seeing possibilities in turning towards new resources.

We choose renewable materials because they are natural resources that can be  planted and grown  again. This is unlike fossil fuel based materials, which once used, we cannot replenish.

Renewable materials are not only natural materials, but also bio-synthetic materials that have a plant feedstock  instead of fossil fuel. 

This feedstock is  chemically processed into intermediate substances and  is turned into synthetic materials in the end.

A gorpcore-inspired T-shirt with a baby-tee silhouette and pops of color.Introducing the Lift Your Mind collection, a capsule line designed to be worn from the city to the trails. Embrace nature in style with functional looks that make it easy to get out and stay out.

With muted colors as a base, the Lift Your Mind Tee uses contrasting pops of color and different textures for a laidback look with a gorpcore edge. Its slim fit = a great base layer, while ribbed inserts, a silicone logo and contrasting stitching also make it a standalone piece. A cropped length certifies the Y2K silhouette, supported by soft fabric that lets you take your relaxed vibe wherever you go.

name: Essentials Crop Top
description:
A laid-back crop top with a relaxed, roomy fit.Take your casual style to the next level in this adidas crop top. Cut from soft cotton jersey in a relaxed shape, it's an easygoing essential made to pair with everything from joggers to denim. Wear it for low-key weekends when comfort calls, or dress it up with a structured blazer for an elevated vibe. However you style it, the small Trefoil logo on the front connects you to a legacy of style and sport. 

The cotton in this product has been sourced through Better Cotton. Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products.

Find out more here: https://bettercotton.org/who-we-are/our-logo/

name: Power AEROREADY Crop Cover-Up Sweatshirt
description:
A crop sweatshirt made with a blend of recycled and renewable materials.Build confidence as you build strength in this adidas sweatshirt. A loose fit and soft, stretchy French terry fabric make it super comfy. AEROREADY manages moisture to keep you dry as you build heat. Partly disconnected sleeves let you reach overhead without feeling restricted. 

A minimum of 70% of this product is a blend of recycled and renewable materials.

name: Short Vegan Puffer Jacket
description:
A minimalist puffy jacket made with recycled and vegan materials.Stay warm while you make a statement with this adidas vegan puffer jacket. Synthetic REVODOWN fill combines with a stand-up collar and storm flap to keep out the cold. A loose fit gives you plenty of room for layers. A shiny branded zipper pull and embroidered Trefoil logo add signature style. 

To reduce our reliance on virgin materials, we make sure that our vegan alternatives also contain a minimum of 25% recycled content.

name: Trefoil Big Logo Hoodie
description:
A two-piece hoodie with an interchangeable look.Your day-to-day mood doesn't define you. Similarly, your style should be free to grow and adjust as you do. This versatile adidas hoodie is all about flexibility thanks to its unique two-piece design. First, a boxy short sleeve layer sets up iconic adidas style with a bold Trefoil graphic across the front. A secondary crop overlay provides an extra layer of comfort with its long sleeved silhouette and drawcord-adjustable hood. No matter how you wear this playful piece, you'll be sure to make a big impact. 

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future. 

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products, however, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source." 

Find out more here:bettercotton.org/learnmore

These pants were made using UNITEFIT — an all-gender fit system that was created with a spectrum of sizes, genders and forms in mind.

This product has been made with at least 70% renewable materials. Switching to renewable material sources offers more options to reduce our reliance on finite resources. We choose renewable materials because they are natural resources that can be  planted and grown  again. This is unlike fossil fuel based materials, which once used, we cannot replenish.

Renewable materials are not only natural materials, but also bio-synthetic materials that have a plant feedstock  instead of fossil fuel. 

This feedstock is  chemically processed into intermediate substances and  is turned into synthetic materials in the end.

These kind of products represent our commitment to help end plastic waste.The TERREX MADE TO BE REMADE PADDED ANORAK is the first insulated jacket made within the new loop creation process. Wear it down, then return it. Once returned, the anorak will be remade into something new. 
We grind it, shred it, and turn it into something new. The end of one product is the beginning of the next. Without any compromise on performance. Products like this represent our commitment to help end plastic waste.

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future.

An outdoor-inspired, material-mix Y-3 pullover that's made with nature.The blending of function and fashion gets explored with the Y-3 Stretch Terry Crew Sweatshirt. Taking inspiration from the outdoors, the soft yet technical build is crafted from an organic cotton blend with a slight, comfortable stretch. Jacquard ripstop panels contrast against the main body, with both coming together in a relaxed fit.

This sweatshirt is made with natural and renewable materials as part of our journey to design out finite resources and help end plastic waste.

name: Performance Golf Hoodie
description: A cozy and stretchy golf hoodie made in part with recycled materials.Take on those chilly mornings and breezy afternoons on the course in this adidas golf hoodie. It's made from a soft brushed fabric for a smooth and cozy feel and has plenty of stretch to let you swing comfortably. The hood comes in handy for those windy areas, so you can keep focused on your game, not the elements.

name: Always Original Super Girl Track Top (Plus Size)
description:
A reinvented, crop track top with a corset design and sheer sleeves."This collection represents the authentic femme energy that lives inside and encompasses many layers. Complex and direct, strong and delicate. Never binary, but all of it, designed to champion all bodies and forms of femininity. We're divine, we're omnipotent, we're feminine, we are original." — Jari Jones

Co-created with actress, model and activist, Jari Jones, the Always Original Super Girl Track Top (Plus Size) honors your inner hero. A corset design pushes the iconic adidas Superstar Tracksuit into new realms, alongside sheer, oversized sleeves. The lingerie-inspired cropped jacket is finished with a stand-up collar and full zip, so you can swiftly suit up and take on the world.

name: Rib Corset Tank Top (Plus Size)
description:
This corset is made with a blend of recycled and renewable materials.Made of soft ribbed fabric, this adidas corset tank top fits snug but stays comfortable for hours of wear. A rounded hem in the front shapes a flattering silhouette that zips in the back for a clean look all around. Layer it over a billowy blouse or wear it solo for seriously bold vibes. A small logo and Trefoil centered on the front add subtle hints of sport.

A minimum of 70% of this product is a blend of recycled and renewable materials.

name: Select Basketball Shorts
description: Basketball shorts built for movement.Celebrate the rich history of basketball style in these adidas shorts. They're made from recycled polyester single jersey fabric that's soft, durable and perfect for putting in work on your handle of running the court during pickup. A drawcord on the elastic waist secures the fit, while a 3 Bar Logo on the seam completes the look.

name: 3-Stripes Mini Dress
description:
A tight-fitting mini dress with 3-Stripes style for a sporty look.With style drawn from the adidas archives, this mini dress lets you make a bold statement. Its body-hugging fit and soft, stretchy fabric move with you from day to night. The square neck lets you layer on a few necklaces or wear it alone. Echoing the legacy of adidas' authentic athletic spirit, this dress allows you to express yourself and connect with the brand's roots. 

The cotton in this product has been sourced through Better Cotton. Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products.

Find out more here: https://bettercotton.org/who-we-are/our-logo/

name: ALL SZN Washed Tee
description:
A soft, baggy tee with a stylish crop cut for your daily look.It's the casual feel of a soft pullover in the form of a crop tee. This adidas ALL SZN t-shirt comes in a loose fit for a baggy silhouette. Embroidered lettering and a tonal adidas Badge of Sport sign off the look.

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future.

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain-of-custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products. However, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source."

Find out more here: bettercotton.org/learnmore

A celebration of self-expression, imagination and the unwavering belief that love unites, the collaboration explores fluidity, color and patterns. This partnership is one part of our effort to honor the LGBTQIA+ community alongside our Global Purpose partner, Athlete Ally.

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future. 

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain-of-custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products. However, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source."

Based on the ones Sweden players wear in the pre-game lineup, this adidas Z.N.E. soccer hoodie is cut from four-way stretch material that won't restrict your movements or your mindset. Soft and roomy, it includes AEROREADY to keep you confident for whatever lies ahead.

A minimum of 70% of this product is a blend of recycled and renewable materials.

name: Ultimate Running Conquer the Elements Body Warmer Vest
description:
A running vest with adjustable straps, made in part with a blend of recycled and renewable materials.Layer up in this adidas running vest and conquer your cold-weather miles. Pull it on over any top, and adjust the straps for a perfect fit. Lightweight insulation keeps your core warm so you can stay on pace, and WIND.RDY protects you during blustery conditions. A large front pocket stashes your hat, gloves and other essentials so you can adapt to changing conditions on the fly.

A minimum of 70% of this product is a blend of recycled and renewable materials.

name: Adicolor Essentials Leggings
description:
Minimalist leggings for expressing your originality.Wear them however you want. The minimalist style of these adidas leggings means they're easy to make your own. Pair them with oversized hoodies, bulky sneakers or a sheer top. Whatever you feel good in, they look good with. The soft, body-hugging fabric hits right at your waist.

Our cotton products support more sustainable cotton farming.

name: Y-3 Knit Cardigan
description: A Y-3 cardigan with asymmetrical knit patterns.The Y-3 Knit Cardigan exudes sophistication though simplicity. Different asymmetrical knit patterns come together in a seemingly random construction. The loose shape layers casually and comfortably in soft knit.

name: Originals Monogram Full-Coverage Top
description:
A full-coverage swim top made in part with recycled materials.Make an impression at the beach or the pool in this adidas full-coverage swim top. A monogram Trefoil print on the sleeves gives it a sleek look. A built-in bra provides light support for beach walks and lap swims.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Techfit Volleyball Shorts
description: Streamlined shorts for the volleyball court.Look good. Feel good. Play better. These adidas Techfit volleyball shorts give you one less thing to worry about on the court. Made from stretchy fabric that flexes with your movement, they deliver a locked-in feel that supports every jump and dive. The pre-curved waistband will keep you comfortable point after point.

name: Two-Color Ottoman Sleeveless Golf Polo Shirt
description: A stretchy, sleeveless golf polo made in part with recycled materials.Swing without restrictions while you shoot low. This adidas golf polo shirt is made of a soft and stretchy fabric to keep you comfortable from the time you tee off till you sink the last putt. The sleeveless design lets you swing freely, and the half zip helps ventilate when the weather warms up.

name: Essentials Jogger Pants
description: Golf joggers for lightweight comfort, made with Parley Ocean Plastic.These adidas golf joggers take you through your morning round and the rest of your active day in comfort. The soft, lightweight fabric in these pants has plenty of stretch to ensure a full range of motion. The wide, mid-rise elastic waist offers a supportive feel on and off the course. Cuffed hems add the finishing touch.

name: TERREX Liteflex Hiking Pants
description:
Trekking pants made in part with recycled materials.Head for the mountains ready to move and explore. These adidas hiking pants combine plenty of stretch with adjustable cuffs for an unrestricted stride. The lightweight weave sheds splashes and light moisture as you move through wet brush or rock hop across a stream. Snaps at the cuffs let you dial in the pant leg to match your boots or shoes. Zip pockets keep small essentials secure.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: adidas x FARM Rio Bikini
description:
A beachy bikini made in part with a blend of recycled and renewable materials.Being in a sunny mood comes naturally when you wear this adidas bikini. The top has a strappy design and removable pads. Rich, sun-drenched colors and a sun-inspired print celebrate warm days and bright sunshine.

A minimum of 70% of this product is a blend of recycled and renewable materials.
color: Vivid Red S21 / Bliss Pink F22

name: Run It Brand Love Tee
description:
A bold brand logo tee made with recycled materials.The latest adidas running range fuses style with function to keep you looking and feeling good while you put in the kms. The high-performance pieces were designed to minimize distraction on high-energy runs, so you can focus on having fun while you stride.

Enjoy those feel-good vibes with this graphic tee from adidas. It's lightweight and specially designed to let you move freely. Sweat-wicking AEROREADY helps to keep you feeling dry, plus reflective details add a touch of shine to the classic silhouette. Made with 100% recycled materials, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Y-3 Organic Cotton Terry Crew Sweater
description:
A Y-3 sweatshirt."Y-3 is a strong examination of the blend of sport and style and the tension caused by mixing tradition with all that is modern."  — Yohji Yamamoto 

A Y-3 essential receives a fresh update. The Organic Cotton Terry Crew Sweatshirt has a casual, oversized shape built in soft cotton French terry. A tonal, soft-to-the-touch Y-3 logo makes its mark.

Made with at least 50% organic cotton. A more sustainable choice for those who grow it and for the planet.

name: Adicolor Essentials Crew Sweatshirt (Plus Size)
description:
A soft fleece sweatshirt that lets you move in total comfort.Even in a sweatshirt, your style is clear. Consider this adidas pullover your foundation for expression, and definitely for comfort. Mix up the vibe with denim or wide-leg trousers, or keep it head-to-toe casual with matching sweat pants for an elevated take on loungewear. Soft fleece launches you straight into a mode of relaxation.

Our cotton products support more sustainable cotton farming.

name: Go-To Dress
description:
A versatile golf dress made in part with recycled content.Stay cool and comfortable on the course so you can play your best. This adidas golf dress is made of lightweight, breathable fabric with AEROREADY to manage moisture and keep you dry. Detached undershorts let you bend and stretch with confidence. The versatile style wears well at the clubhouse after you finish your round. 

Made with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.

name: adidas Originals x KSENIASCHNAIDER Boxer Short Jeans
description:
Jeans with sporty style, made with a blend of recycled and renewable materials.Athletic attitude infuses these jeans with two styles that work perfectly as one. Blending adidas Originals DNA with classic denim, they re-construct our iconic track pants into a pair of loose-fit, wide-leg jeans. We created them in collaboration with Ksenia and Anton Schnaider, a Ukranian fashion powerhouse couple with a mind for simplicity and a good-natured approach to design. 

A minimum of 70% of this product is a blend of recycled and renewable materials.

name: 3-Stripes Insulated Vest
description:
An insulated vest with timeless style, made with recycled materials.From town to trail, layer up in this adidas insulated vest to keep your core warm. Synthetic padding holds the heat close to your body, plus it has a stand-up collar so you don't need a scarf. Tuck small belongings into the two zip pockets and head out into the crisp air showing your brand pride with a logo on the back.

Made with 100% recycled materials, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Optime Stash Pocket High-Waisted 7/8 Leggings
description:
Versatile high-rise workout tights made in part with recycled materials.No matter which way you move, these training tights are your new go-to pair. Cardio to leg day, you're ready, as these tights have a slick, smooth feel and supportive four-way stretch. Focus on your reps and beating your personal goals, thanks to a seamless design on the sides and a comfortable high-rise waist. AEROREADY manages moisture, so you'll feel good all workout long. Stash your essentials in the thigh pocket to keep them handy. adidas 3-Stripes seal the deal.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Tailored HIIT Training 7/8 Leggings
description:
Tailored training tights made with recycled materials.Go hard in total comfort. These adidas tights give you powerful performance for your most intense workouts. Push your limits without distractions, because HEAT.RDY helps you keep going strong all training session long. They're tailored to your body's movements, with four-way stretch and ventilation where you need it most. They're slick and supportive, so you'll feel more powerful the instant you put them on. Stash your essentials in the pockets and focus on your moves.

Made with 100% recycled materials, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: adidas by Stella McCartney TruePace Running Shorts
description:
High-performance running shorts made with recycled materials.Every step counts. Around the block, up the mountain, through the finish line — it doesn't matter how far you go, just that you go. These adidas by Stella McCartney running shorts help you get moving. The loose build lets you focus solely on what's in front of you without distraction. 

Made with 100% recycled materials, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Boston Marathon 2024 Own the Run Half-Zip Tee
description:
A Boston Marathon zipped tee made in part with recycled materials.Every second counts when you reach for the extraordinary. Whether you're trying to eclipse your own running benchmark or challenging your friends on a race, there's nothing more important than a strong kickstart. 

Cut with a regular fit for a zero-distraction performance, the Boston Marathon 2024 Own The Run Zip Tee will give you the confidence you need to begin on the right foot. Its reflective elements ensure visibility in low light, while the AEROREADY keeps you dry. 

Slide your fingers through the thumbholes to protect your hands in cold weather or to simply keep the sleeves in place as you run. With the famous Boston Marathon emblem on the chest, setting the tone for a remarkable race has never been easier. 

This product is made with at least 60% recycled materials.

name: HILO Jersey
description:
A short sleeve volleyball jersey made in part with recycled materials.Cut out for the volleyball court. This adidas HILO jersey combines stretchy fabric and a fit that supports overhead play. Moisture-wicking AEROREADY keeps you comfortable during intense action, and the droptail hem has you covered during every dive and leap. Standing out on the shoulders, contrast 3-Stripes add the perfect sporty finish.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 60% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: RAIN.RDY Jacket
description: A waterproof golf rain jacket made with recycled materials.All weather is good weather for a round of golf when you're prepared to stay dry and warm. This waterproof, breathable adidas golf rain jacket sets you up to play through steady drizzle or a passing shower. RAIN.RDY seals out wet weather to keep you dry and comfortable. The ultralight, three-layer build features a soft, quiet material with plenty of stretch that doesn't disturb your focus as you move. Zip pockets add utility for storing tees, phone or balls.

name: Own the Run Tee (Plus Size)
description:
A lightweight running tee with reflective details for everyday running.Whether you're hitting the pavement with your community or on your own, there's nothing quite like the joyful rush of a runner's high. One thing's for sure: comfort and support are paramount in maximizing your daily dose of endorphins. 

Enter the Own the Run Tee (Plus Size), destined to be your new go-to for short runs and distance days alike. Crafted from lightweight fabric, the top features sweat-wicking AEROREADY fabric to help keep you feeling dry. The sporty silhouette features 3-Stripes style to help you subtly standout as you put in the kms, while reflective details shine when the light fades.

name: adidas Yoga Studio 7/8 Leggings (Plus Size)
description: Second-skin yoga tights made in part with recycled materials.Bring a yoga mindset with you wherever you go. These adidas training tights perform on or off the mat. Adisoft is super soft and supportive, to contour the body in motion. AEROREADY takes care of moisture when you start to build heat. The high waist hugs you in and stays in place as you move.

name: Y-3 Firebird Track Top
description: Y-3 reimagines the famed Firebird design with this track top.Y-3 revisits one of adidas' most iconic designs in this Firebird Track Top that's been updated with a Y-3 twist. It's made from a mix of premium materials for a smooth, comfortable feel. The loose fit means it's perfect for layering. Engineered 3-Stripes sign off the look.

name: adidas x Marimekko Tennis Skirt
description: Express yourself in a bold skirt made in part with recycled materials.Designed to empower and inspire. This adidas x Marimekko tennis skirt is all about self-expression on court. Dressed in one of the world-famous design house's bold prints, it'll keep you comfortable and confident with a wide waistband and separate inner tights. Stretchy fabric and translucent pleats on the sides allow for increased freedom of movement, so you're always where you need to be. AEROREADY absorbs moisture to ensure your game stays as vibrant as your look.

name: Y-3 Bomber Jacket
description: An insulated Y-3 jacket.Drawing on vintage utilitarian and workwear aesthetics, the Y-3 Bomber Jacket puts a focus on functionality. It's crafted for a relaxed fit from durable cotton-nylon twill and padded for warmth with PrimaLoft® insulation. Various pockets detail the build throughout — on the sleeve and at the front.

name: adidas by Stella McCartney TrueStrength Seamless Leggings
description:
Warm high-rise leggings made in part with recycled materials.Found: The perfect baselayer for your next ski trip. These adidas by Stella McCartney leggings are form fitting, warm and exceptionally soft, letting you focus on the slopes. The high-rise waist keeps your core insulated, and the thick-knit fabric stays flexible as you navigate your run.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
color: Easy Mint / Dove Grey / Active Red

name: Graphic Pride Tank Top
description:
An easy-to-wear tank top with a signature look, from designer Rich Mnisi.Let love be your legacy. South African designer Rich Mnisi once wrote that reminder in a handwritten letter to his younger queer self, and today it thrives at the core of the adidas x Rich Mnisi Pride Collection. A celebration of self-expression, imagination and the unwavering belief that love unites, the collaboration explores fluidity, color and patterns. This partnership is one part of our effort to honor the LGBTQIA+ community alongside our Global Purpose partner Athlete Ally.

Love unites, and this adidas tank top lets you know it in confident, colorful style. Stylized lettering and all-cotton jersey create a look that feels good to wear for more reasons than one. This shirt was made using UNITEFIT — an all-gender fit system that was created with a spectrum of sizes, genders and forms in mind. 

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future. 

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain-of-custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products. However, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source." 

Find out more here:bettercotton.org/learnmore

name: Powerimpact Training Medium-Support Bra
description: A medium-support sports bra made in part with recycled materials.Give it your all. It's time to throw down, and this adidas bra is what you want on when you do. From HIIT training to heart-pumping sessions on the bike — targeted mesh panels increase airflow for cool relief as the heat builds. Sleek adiflex has a slick, cool-to-the-touch feel. AEROREADY technology is there to help you stay dry and comfortable too. No chafing here. The purposeful design makes sure of it.

name: Rich Mnisi x The Cycling Jersey (Plus Size)
description:
An inspired cycling jersey made in part with recycled materials.Let love be your legacy. South African designer Rich Mnisi once wrote that reminder in a handwritten letter to his younger queer self, and today it thrives at the core of the adidas x Rich Mnisi Pride Collection. A celebration of self-expression, imagination and the unwavering belief that love unites, the collaboration explores fluidity, color and patterns. This partnership is one part of our effort to honor the LGBTQIA+ community alongside our Global Purpose partners, Athlete Ally and Stonewall UK.

Celebrate color and culture. Created in collaboration with designer Rich Mnisi, this adidas cycling jersey shares his Love Unites theme to fuel rides short and long. The jersey's soft, stretchy fit cuts a clean silhouette without feeling restrictive. AEROREADY manages sweat to keep you feeling dry, comfortable and ready to keep riding, and a mesh back insert maximizes breathability. A traditional rear three-pocket design adds a small zip pocket to secure a key or ID.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Yoga Studio Crop Tank Top
description: A reversible crop top made in part with recycled materials.This adidas reversible yoga top can be worn two different ways, which means you're always styled to match the day's vibe. Wear it as a high-neck tank top with an open back or with a plunging neckline and a closed back. AEROREADY keeps you dry, and shimmery fabric and cross-back straps give it elevated appeal. Think of it as yin and yang.

name: Adizero Running Tank Top
description:
A featherlight running tank top made in part with recycled materials.When it comes to achieving your goals, every second counts. From training to race day, powerful performances call for high-tech gear that's optimized for speed. Introducing the latest range of lightweight running staples that help you push beyond your limits without distraction.

This adidas running tank top ensures comfort and easy movement with every stride. Featherlight fabric is perforated to reduce weight and add airflow, while sweat-wicking AEROREADY helps keep you feeling dry. Plus, a racerback cut reduces chafing, so you can run for the finish line, free from distractions.

Made with at least 70% recycled materials, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Adicolor Contempo Tailored Skirt (Gender Neutral)
description:
A pleated skirt that matches sophistication with a sporty vibe.This season, adicolor reimagines loungewear classics with a sartorial sensitivity. Tailored dressing collides with sportswear as icons from the archive are crafted in unblemished soft suiting twill.Minimal and understated, the 3-Stripes are refined in a chunky treatment for a subtle finish. ​ 

Explore new fashion parameters with the adicolor Contempo Tailored Skirt. Crisp, clean and chic, it takes the original shape of an athletic-inspired silhouette and sharpens it with tailored pleats. As playful as it is minimalistic, the skirt can be paired with a wide range of kicks — to style it the way that suits you.

name: Tiro 23 League Pants (Plus Size)
description:
Moisture-managing track pants for training, made with recycled materials.Born for the beautiful game. Part of the Tiro 23 League range, these adidas soccer pants use AEROREADY to channel moisture away from your skin and keep you firing on all cylinders. Ankle zips mean they're easy to slide off when your session is done.

Made with 100% recycled materials, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Trefoil Dress
description:
A relaxed dress that pays homage to the rich heritage of adidas.Celebrate the authentic spirit of adidas in the Trefoil Dress. With a loose, casual build made from a soft cotton blend, it's ready to bring comfort to your everyday style. Echoing the iconic Trefoil, it connects you to decades of boundary-pushing athletes and visionaries. Made for cozy days in and nights out on the town, it's all about letting you rep your adidas pride in style. 

The cotton in this product has been sourced through Better Cotton. Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products.

Find out more here: https://bettercotton.org/who-we-are/our-logo/

name: TERREX Agravic Windweave Trail Running Windbreaker
description: A light and versatile Terrex trail running windbreaker.Slip into the forest with this trail running windbreaker from adidas. Windweave fabric offers body-mapped wind protection to keep you warm in blustery weather. Ascend rough terrain in foul conditions with this jacket's durable water-repellent finish and stay dry in light rain. Elasticated cuffs and a fitted hood keep you warm as you run. And when the sun comes out, this shell's pack-it solution lets you fold it into its chest pocket for compact storage until you need it again.

name: Adicolor 3-Stripes Swimsuit
description:
A classic swimsuit made in part with recycled materials.The Trefoil logo on the front of this sporty swimsuit puts its adidas DNA on display. An open back and high-cut legs give it a stylish silhouette that's just right for the beach or pool. Iconic 3-Stripes add an authentic touch.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: 3-Stripes Baby Tee
description:
A soft, tight-fit tee that brings in the energy of adidas.This body-skimming adidas tee lets you rock Originals' heritage in a fresh, energetic way. It pairs a comfortable cotton blend with the iconic 3-Stripes down the sleeves. Wear it to signal your connection to decades of athletic tradition. 

The cotton in this product has been sourced through Better Cotton. Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products.

Find out more here: https://bettercotton.org/who-we-are/our-logo/

name: AEROREADY Train Essentials Woven Quarter-Zip Track Jacket
description:
A quarter-zip jacket made with recycled materials.Whether you're training indoors or out, this adidas track jacket keeps you ready for your warmup, cool-down and everything in between. Made of a soft yet durable material, it stretches when you need it to and stays breathable throughout your session. Front snap pockets keep the must-haves close, and the quarter-zip design lets you ventilate whenever you want. Not that you'll really need to — AEROREADY manages moisture for comfort and a cool, dry feel.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Terrex Xperior 2L Insulated RAIN.RDY Jacket
description:
A waterproof and insulated ski jacket made in part with recycled materials.Zip up in warmth and weather protection that lets you take on cold lift rides and stormy ski days in comfort with the Terrex Xperior 2L Insulated RAIN.RDY Jacket. 

Using advanced waterproofing materials and construction, it's designed to keep the water out, while low-profile PrimaLoft® synthetic insulation seals in warmth. Skier-designed features like an integrated snow skirt and zip vents help you adapt to changing conditions. A dedicated pass pocket and an attached lens cloth make for smooth days on the mountain, while a mix of pockets inside and out offer secure storage for your phone and other ski-day essentials.

Made with a series of recycled materials and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Textured Full-Zip Jacket (Plus Size)
description: A sleek golf jacket made in part with recycled materials.Make the most of conditions in this adidas golf jacket. The soft, textured fabric has built-in stretch so you can swing and reach without restriction. A high collar helps seal out the chill. The sleek style elevates your look on and off the course.

This adidas by Stella McCartney pick blurs the line between a sports bra and a tank top, letting you take on your workout in a combo of both. It's made with HEAT.RDY technology that is designed to keep you going when things heat up, and laser-cut perforations keep the cool air flowing. The material is buttery soft and perfectly stretchy, giving you the right fit every time. A classic racerback prevents straps from slipping or digging in.

name: AEROREADY Logo Running Windbreaker
description:
A colorblocked running windbreaker made with recycled materials.Breathe in. Breathe out. Get moving. No matter where you plan to run, this adidas windbreaker is up for the challenge. AEROREADY absorbs moisture as you tick off the miles, so you stay dry and comfortable step after step. When you need some shelter from the elements, just pull on the three-piece hood and stay focused on your pace. 

Made with 100% recycled materials, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

This Terrex anorak was Made to Be Remade.Explore the outdoors you respect and love in this adidas Terrex anorak. Pack it into its hood, stow it in your backpack and pull it out when the weather shifts. A longer back offers coverage and warmth when the wind picks up and the clouds block out the sun. Slip on this forward-thinking anorak, and help protect the planet.

We're moving toward new ways of returning and remaking. Products Made to Be Remade, not thrown away. Wear it out. Send it back. We'll remake it. A better choice for both you and the planet.

For real change to happen, we need to accelerate towards decarbonization. To do that we first need to understand the impact we are already making so we can improve and have a bar to raise.

From raw material extraction, processing, packaging, all the way to the end of product's life, we measured the carbon footprint (CO2e) of this product, conforming to an internationally recognized standard: ISO 14067.

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future. 

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain-of-custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products. However, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source."

This product has been made with at least 70% renewable materials. Switching to renewable material sources offers more options to reduce our reliance on finite resources. We choose renewable materials because they are natural resources that can be  planted and grown  again. This is unlike fossil fuel based materials, which once used, we cannot replenish.

Renewable materials are not only natural materials, but also bio-synthetic materials that have a plant feedstock  instead of fossil fuel. 

This feedstock is  chemically processed into intermediate substances and  is turned into synthetic materials in the end.

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future. 

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products, however, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source."

name: Tiro Pants
description:
Moisture-wicking track pants made with recycled materials.Take your soccer style beyond the touchline. Thanks to those signature tapered legs, these adidas Tiro pants need no introduction. Born on the training ground, they feature ankle zips for easy on and off and moisture-managing AEROREADY for comfortable movement. Zip pockets offer secure storage for your everyday essentials.

Made with 100% recycled materials, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: adidas by Stella McCartney Sportswear Sweatshirt
description:
A cozy pullover made with a blend of recycled and renewable materials.There are few things more effortless than this adidas by Stella McCartney sweatshirt. In seconds (which is how long it takes to throw on), you're blanketed in the comfort of a soft organic cotton blend. The loose shape not only layers perfectly, but it also creates the look of sophisticated ease with its minimalist build and color. 

A minimum of 70% of this product is a blend of recycled and renewable materials.

name: Quarter-Zip Long Sleeve Golf Polo Shirt
description: A stretchy, long sleeve golf tee made in part with recycled materials.Bring some of that golf style to the clubhouse. This adidas golf polo shirt is made with a soft and stretchy fabric blend to keep you comfortable once you put the clubs away. The mock neck and long sleeves keep you covered on days when a polo shirt doesn't cut it.

name: adidas by Stella McCartney TruePurpose 2-in-1 Training Shorts
description:
The look of two shorts in one, made in part with recycled materials.Get the coverage you want with the comfort you need in these adidas by Stella McCartney training shorts. A tight-fit pair sits beneath a looser pair to keep you feeling confident, no matter which workout you're taking on today. The high-rise waist is supportive and comfortable, and HEAT.RDY technology keeps you cool when things heat up. Laser-cut perforations and translucent mesh panels help circulate the air. You've got this.

This product is made with at least 70% recycled materials. By reusing materials that have already been created, we help to reduce waste and our reliance on finite resources and reduce the footprint of the products we make.

name: HIIT HEAT.RDY Crop Tank Top
description:
A sleek top with mesh inserts, made in part with recycled materials.Tackle your sweatiest HIIT workouts in this adidas tank top. HEAT.RDY helps you stay cool as you move from burpees to kettle bell swings to bicycle crunches. Double straps and wrapping mesh panels in back give it a sophisticated look. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Break the Norm Graphic Tee (Gender Neutral)
description:
A tee made in part with Parley Ocean Plastic.Running isn't just movement, it's a mindset. This graphic tee spells out what you're all about with an oversized adidas Running graphic on the back and a smaller version on the chest. Whatever your story, you'll appreciate its clean and simple design and comfortable build. This tee was made using UNITEFIT — an all-gender fit system that was created with a spectrum of sizes, genders and forms in mind.

This garment is made with a yarn which contains 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. This garment contains at least 70% recycled content in total.

name: LOUNGEWEAR Essentials 3-Stripes Leggings
description:
Stretchy tights with classic sport style.Everyday versatility meets classic styling. These adidas leggings feature a signature sporty look with 3-Stripes and an adidas Badge of Sport on the hip. Stretchy and comfortable, these tights are made with soft cotton.

Our cotton products support sustainable cotton farming. This is part of our ambition to end plastic waste.

name: LOUNGEWEAR Essentials 3-Stripes Leggings
description:
Stretchy tights with classic sport style.Everyday versatility meets classic styling. These adidas leggings feature a signature sporty look with 3-Stripes and an adidas Badge of Sport on the hip. Stretchy and comfortable, these tights are made with soft cotton.

name: Terrex Xperior 2L Insulated Bib Pants
description: Waterproof, breathable and insulated bib pants for skiing and snowboarding.All-day warmth and comfort are a given in these Terrex insulated bib pants. Whether you like to ride the park or ski off-piste, they offer waterproof, breathable storm coverage with the insulation to keep you riding all day long. Low-profile PrimaLoft® synthetic insulation seals in warmth, and waterproof, breathable adidas RAIN.RDY sheds wind and snow while letting your body breathe to regulate its temperature. The full rise of the bib adds an extra layer of warmth while providing an easy-access pocket for ski day essentials. Adjustable waist tabs let you fine-tune the fit, and the jacket interface connects with other outerwear.

name: Fast Impact Reflect At Night X-City Full-Length Running Leggings
description:
Sleek, reflective running leggings with an adjustable high-rise waistband.The X-City Reflect At Night collection was made with your next run in mind. The range combines sleek silhouettes with fluorescent elements for maximum style points, while visibility markers highlight biological motion. Biomotion uses the innate ability of humans to recognize the movements of other humans by their motions" — Senior Designer Men's Running Apparel, Benedikt Lüdke

Designed for your smoothest run yet, the X-City Reflect At Night High-Rise Running Leggings fuse performance fabric and reflective articulations with a sleek silhouette. Glow-in-the-dark trims are a stylish touch, while an adjustable high-rise waistband keeps the leggings in place as you put in the kms. Not intended for use as Personal Protective Equipment (PPE).

name: Yoga Studio Tee
description:
An adidas studio tee made in part with recycled materials.Comfortable and stylish? Yes. Barre to the yoga mat, you'll feel as good as you look when you're wearing this adidas t-shirt. Wrap and tie the hem loose or tight depending on your mood (or moves). Go ahead and turn up the heat, because AEROREADY absorbs moisture. A peekaboo cutout on the front keeps the air flowing and the chill vibe strong.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Essentials Rib Tank Top
description: A '70s-inspired adidas rib tank top.Fashion in the '70s was all about advocating for both comfort and style, something this adidas tank top knows a lot about. Even the smallest details, like the premium rib knit that creates a hugging fit and subtle texture, drive home the mood. Keep the '70s vibes alive by adding flared leggings or dolphin cut shorts.

name: Tiro Snap-Button Shorts
description:
High-rise shorts made with a blend of recycled and renewable materials.Inspired by the spirit of soccer, styled for your everyday moves. These adidas shorts bring an athletic look to today's itinerary, with the 3-Stripes nodding to the iconic Tiro DNA. The high-rise waist, snap-buttons and crinkle fabric elevate whatever look you decide to rock — they're the versatile building block to your personal expression.

A minimum of 70% of this product is a blend of recycled and renewable materials.

name: HILO Long Sleeve Jersey
description:
A long sleeve volleyball jersey made in part with recycled materials.Cut out for the volleyball court. This adidas HILO jersey combines stretchy fabric and a fit that supports overhead play. Moisture-wicking AEROREADY keeps you comfortable during intense action, and the droptail hem has you covered during every dive and leap. Running down the long sleeves, contrast 3-Stripes add the perfect sporty finish.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 60% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Hyperglam Training Crop Long Sleeve Tee
description:
A cropped tee with mesh details, made in part with recycled materials.Sporty, but make it cute. That's the philosophy behind this adidas cropped tee. Feel confident pushing through high intensity intervals thanks to moisture-absorbing AEROREADY and mesh panels that add targeted breathability. Long sleeves that show off 3-Stripes give it athletic cred, while the cropped length pairs perfectly with your favorite leggings or shorts. 

This product is made with at least 70% recycled materials. By reusing materials that have already been created, we help to reduce waste and our reliance on finite resources and reduce the footprint of the products we make.

name: ALL SZN Fleece Washed Tee
description:
A soft, baggy tee with a stylish crop cut for your daily look.It's the casual feel of a soft pullover in the form of a crop tee. This adidas ALL SZN t-shirt comes in a loose fit for a baggy silhouette. Embroidered lettering and a tonal adidas Badge of Sport sign off the look.

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future.

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain-of-custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products. However, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source."

Find out more here: bettercotton.org/learnmore

name: Frill Skort (Plus Size)

The wide elastic waistband offers a supportive feel. Undershorts stay in place with grip tape at the hem for distraction-free play.

Cut for a loose fit with wide sleeves, this vibrant adidas training t-shirt is perfect for layering over a sports bra. The light, stretchy fabric lets you move freely, while AEROREADY keeps you dry through all types of workouts.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: 3-Stripes Graphic Swimsuit (Plus Size)

This garment is made of chlorine-resistant fabric that features ECONYL® regenerated yarn.
color: Wonder Steel F22 / Black / Earth Strata S23 / White

You shouldn't need to layer two or three bras to get the support you need. All you need is this adidas AEROREADY workout bra. With its minimal design and high support, you're ready to grab your jump rope and head to the boxing gym.

description:

name: Powerimpact Training Medium-Support Bra
description: A medium-support sports bra made in part with recycled materials.Give it your all. It's time to throw down, and this adidas bra is what you want on when you do. From HIIT training to heart-pumping sessions on the bike — targeted mesh panels increase airflow for cool relief as the heat builds. Sleek adiflex has a slick, cool-to-the-touch feel. AEROREADY technology is there to help you stay dry and comfortable too. No chafing here. The purposeful design makes sure of it.

name: Pintuck Pull-On Pants
description:
Golf pants with a fold-over waist, made in part with recycled materials.Bring a sleek look to your game in these adidas golf pants. The soft, lightweight fabric has plenty of stretch to allow a full range of motion, and the wide, fold-over waist gives extra support. The slim-fitting style with pintuck details keeps your look on point on and off the course. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Jacquard Long Sleeve Jersey
description: This jacquard long sleeve is the everyday jersey.We've taken all the best bits of a soccer jersey, but reimagined it for the everyday. Finally, a top as versatile as your lifestyle.

Cargo pockets, slip-in pockets and a patch pocket with webbing tape lean into the utilitarian look. Zips on the front let you open up the silhouette and create a flared hem.

Our cotton products support more sustainable cotton farming.

Not with this adidas by Stella McCartney jacket on your back, the perfect response to cold-weather cardio or a chilly morning commute. Made with a super-soft material, it keeps you warm but cools you off with HEAT.RDY — innovative technology designed to keep you going when things heat up. Side zip pockets offer convenience, and thumbhole cuffs keep the fit in place. A two-way zipper from top to bottom lets in fresh air wherever you need it most. You've got this, whatever this is.

This garment is made with a yarn which contains 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. This garment contains at least 70% recycled content in total.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

description:
A tight-fitting training onesie with an allover nature-inspired print.This season of adidas by Stella McCartney is a stylish reminder of the joy that comes with moving your body in nature. Technical details are fused with fashion-forward, Earth-inspired design motifs, from psychedelic trees and camouflage patterns to moiré wood prints. The collection honors the incomparable beauty of the natural world, inspiring you to take the gym outside. 

Get ready to sweat it out in style in the adidas by Stella McCartney TrueNature Onesie. Crafted from luxe recycled materials and cut for a flattering tight fit, the all-in-one suit features an elegant open-back design which provides a welcome salve during intense workouts. The chic psychedelic-inspired tree print adds a sophisticated touch, allowing for easy integration into your daily wardrobe.

The color pops against the black foundation, and it's crafted for a relaxed fit from durable cotton-canvas material. It's made with a workwear-inspired collar and button-front closure and is finished with two pockets.

Our cotton products support more sustainable cotton farming.

name: XPERIOR MERINO 260 BASE LAYER 3/4 TIGHT
description: Our warmest 260gsm Merino wool base layer tights, for big days in the cold.Every great adventure starts from a solid basecamp. Our base layer tights use our heaviest Merino count and are designed for really long days out in the cold. 260gsm of 100% Merino wool wrap comfortably around your legs like an extra layer of skin. Merino wool naturally helps regulate body temperature whilst remaining breathable and wicks away moisture - keeping you warm.

name: Y-3 Relaxed Short Sleeve Tee

For the 23/24 season, adidas dipped into the club's DNA to produce a soccer jersey with a design that looks the part — on and off the pitch. 

The Man United 23/24 Away Jersey was created to keep fans comfortable with sweat-wicking AEROREADY and mesh panels. Standing out over those stripes, an embroidered club badge signals your support for the legendary club. Made with 100% recycled materials, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
color: Green Night / Core White / Active Maroon

name: Terrex + and wander Xploric Midlayer Top
description:
A fleece mid layer made with a blend of recycled and renewable materials.adidas Terrex is joining forces with Japanese avant-garde outdoor label and wander for a multi-seasonal collaboration, exploring the universal connectivity of humanity and nature. Both brands celebrate the love for the outdoors and are looking for creative ways to adopt this aesthetic for modern-day city life and outdoor adventures. and wander was founded in 2011 in Tokyo by Keita Ikeuchi and Mihoko Mori after they met as designers at Issey Miyake. Their fashion expertise paired with the admiration for the outdoors elevates adidas Terrex to create a unique collection combining contemporary wearability with mountain ready functionality.

Whether you're exploring around the city or hiking in the hills, this adidas Terrex mid-layer top adds warmth. Soft fleece balances a cozy feel with just right warmth for active days. The zip pockets secure essential items, while the loose fit offers a casual feel. Part of the Terrex collaboration with the Japanese outdoor brand and wander, it includes a reflective graphic print on the sleeves for added flair and visibility. 

A minimum of 70% of this product is a blend of recycled and renewable materials.

name: TERREX XPERIOR VARILITE PRIMALOFT HOODED JACKET
description: Lightweight, packable jacket made with recycled materials and PRIMALOFT Gold insulation for premium warmth.When you're moving through the elements in search of big adventure, reliable insulation and flexibility are essential. This lightweight jacket, made from 100% recycled materials is ready for any outing. PRIMALOFT Gold technology provides premium insulation, with the stretch and breathability to head up any hill, which continues to perform, even when wet. The adjustable hem and elastic binding on the hood and cuffs allow it to fit perfectly to your body shape and under the outer shell. And when the weather drives up, it folds up neatly into its own pack-it pocket.

name: Techrock Stretch PrimaLoft Vest
description: A versatile insulated vest designed with mobility in mind.Fast. Light. Warm. The adidas Techrock Stretch PrimaLoft Vest checks all the boxes for fast and light mountain missions. High-rise leggings made in part with recycled materials.Push through intense cardio, lift heavier at the gym, or flow through your favorite yoga class. Whatever moves you, these adidas leggings provide performance and all-day comfort. Feel confident with the four-way stretch and squat-proof design that holds its shape workout after workout. Stay dry and comfortable when you turn up the heat with moisture-absorbing AEROREADY. 

This product is made with at least 70% recycled materials. By reusing materials that have already been created, we help to reduce waste and our reliance on finite resources and reduce the footprint of the products we make.

name: XPERIOR MERINO 150 BASELAYER SHORT SLEEVE
description: A lightweight 150gsm Merino wool blend helps you manage your temperature and wick the sweat away from your skin when you're out on the trails.Every great adventure starts from a solid basecamp. At 150gsm, the lightest TERREX Merino Base Layer in the range uses a blend of 60% merino and 40% Tencel which keeps you comfortable all the way up the trails, and all the way back to base.

name: Optime Training Luxe 7/8 Leggings
description:
Workout tights with minimal seams, made in part with recycled materials.Cardio day or martial arts class, you can do it all in these adidas training tights. They're built to hug your body with a second-skin feel, supporting all of the ways you move. HEAT.RDY keeps you dry and cool, so you can forget about distractions and stay laser-focused on achieving your goals.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Pintuck 5-Inch Pull-On Golf Shorts
description: Stretchy pull-on golf shorts made in part with recycled materials.Take to the green and swing without restrictions in these adidas golf shorts. They're made of a soft and stretchy fabric blend with a pull-on construction so they're easy to put on and take off after you're done playing. Subtle pintuck details give them a textured look you can wear on and off the course.

name: Rich Mnisi x The Cycling Short Sleeve Jersey
description:
An inspired cycling jersey made in part with a blend of recycled and renewable materials.Let love be your legacy. South African designer Rich Mnisi once wrote that reminder in a handwritten letter to his younger queer self, and today it thrives at the core of the adidas x Rich Mnisi Pride Collection. A celebration of self-expression, imagination and the unwavering belief that love unites, the collaboration explores fluidity, color and patterns. This partnership is one part of our effort to honor the LGBTQIA+ community alongside our Global Purpose partners, Athlete Ally and Stonewall UK.

Celebrate color and culture. Created in collaboration with designer Rich Mnisi, this adidas cycling jersey shares his Love Unites theme to fuel rides short and long. The jersey's soft, stretchy fit cuts a clean silhouette without feeling restrictive. AEROREADY manages sweat to keep you feeling dry, comfortable and ready to keep riding, and a mesh back insert maximizes breathability. A traditional rear three-pocket design adds a small zip pocket to secure a key or ID.

A minimum of 70% of this product is a blend of recycled and renewable materials.

name: Melbourne Tennis Match Tank Top
description: A moisture-wicking tank top with a message of hope, made to rethink our materials.Created for the Southern Hemisphere's most prestigious tennis tournament, this tank top highlights a brand-new approach to carbon recycling. Built using yarn that includes captured industrial emissions, it'll keep you dry and confident with moisture-wicking AEROREADY. Mesh layering around the armholes helps mask your shoulder movements so the element of surprise is always on your side.

name: Scribble Embroidery Crop Tee
description: A tee with sketch-inspired graphics.Tattoos. Scribble art. Doodling in your notepad. They all have one thing in common: they're a reflection of you, just like this adidas tee that's inspired by free-form sketching that celebrates your personal style. It's made of soft cotton single jersey and cut in a loose fit with a crop length. A perfect pairing with high-rise pants so you can handle your day your way.

name: adidas Basketball Track Jacket
description:
An adidas Basketball full-zip jacket built with versatility in mind.The next chapter of adidas Basketball is an exploration in form, function and color. A curated collection, built to fit the needs of the modern athlete. This classic-look track jacket features a full-zip front and a stand-up collar. It is made of premium polyester and cotton fleece material.

Our cotton products support more sustainable cotton farming.

name: Own the Run Tee
description:
A breathable running tee made with recycled materials.This adidas running t-shirt is destined to be a go-to for your short runs and distance days alike. The breathable fabric is made with AEROREADY to absorb moisture and keep you dry. The sporty silhouette features simple 3-Stripes style and reflective details that shine when the light fades.

Made with 100% recycled materials, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Messi Tee
description: A soccer tee celebrating Messi's arrival in Miami.Messi and Miami. The perfect match. Displaying soccer superstar Lionel Messi's logo and number, this adidas tee is ready for kickoff. Perfect for watching his jaw-dropping play or for hanging out with friends, it's built with single jersey fabric for day-long comfort.

name: Optime 7-Inch Leggings (Plus Size)
description:
Four-way stretch short leggings made in part with recycled materials.Break through fitness barriers in these adidas training leggings. Made to move with you through every stretch and bend, their four-way stretch fabric provides support so you can push harder. With moisture-absorbing AEROREADY to keep you dry, you'll always feel confident to go for that extra set. Their high-rise waist holds you in for a secure and flattering fit. When motivation strikes, stash your essentials in the side pocket and get going. 

This product is made with at least 70% recycled materials. By reusing materials that have already been created, we help to reduce waste and our reliance on finite resources and reduce the footprint of the products we make.

description: Short tights with a second-skin fit, made in part with recycled materials.From Side Plank to Humble Warrior, these adidas short tights give you the freedom to flow through every yoga pose without restriction. Soft fabric has a barely there feel and AEROREADY absorbs moisture, so you can keep your mind on your breath. A high-rise waist provides full coverage so you can move with confidence.

name: Essentials Slim Logo Tee

Classic adidas t-shirt that's a wardrobe staple.Looking for a crisp and casual look you can wear every day? This slim-fit tee fits the bill. Clean lines and smooth adidas style partner up in this comfy t-shirt that pairs easily with sweats, jeans or tights.

Our cotton products support sustainable cotton farming. This is part of our ambition to end plastic waste.

name: Go-To Heathered Polo Shirt
description:
A golf polo shirt with side vents, made in part with recycled materials.Whether you're focused on short putts or long drives, this adidas golf polo shirt keeps distractions to a minimum. The vented design lets you focus on the moment, and the soft cotton-blend knit has a casual feel that looks great from the first tee through the post-round clubhouse gathering. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Snake Skin Trefoil Tee
description:
Throw some snakeskin into the mix with this casual t-shirt.There is no bad time or place for animal print. It gives any look a pop — whether used as an accent or a full expression — and on this adidas t-shirt it's snakeskin that gives the Trefoil that added edge. Soft cotton keeps the comfort levels high, which also means you have more than one reason to reach for this tee again and again. If you needed the reminder on reasons, in no particular order we have: comfort, versatility and (of course) snakeskin. 

Our cotton products support more sustainable cotton farming.

name: Knit Golf Romper
description: A soft and stretchy golf romper you can wear on and off the course.Practical and comfortable, this adidas golf romper is made to let you move freely, whether you're walking long stretches on the course or getting your feet right before a long-distance drive. It's made with a soft cotton blend and has a drawcord-adjustable waistband to cinch up or relax your fit.

name: Tennis AEROREADY Pro Y-Tank Top
description:
Challenge the codes of tennis in a tank top made in part with recycled materials.Half a century on from the formation of the WTA and the Battle of the Sexes, this adidas tennis tank top celebrates the good that can come from disrupting the status quo. Showing off an appropriately eye-catching print, it'll keep you quick around the court with a stretchy build, a slim fit and moisture-wicking AEROREADY. That Y-strap at the back is designed to keep your shoulders free and you focused.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: 3-Stripes Baby Tee (Plus Size)
description:
A comfortable, stretchy tee that's a must-have in any wardrobe.Made to move, this soft essential tee is all about expressing your passion for sport. Inspired by adidas' archives but designed for today, it celebrates our heritage of originality. Ribbing creates a classic shape while signature 3-Stripes down the sleeves nod to the legacy of athletes and creators who have shaped adidas. Layer it up or wear it solo—this tee is ready for whatever you have planned. 

The cotton in this product has been sourced through Better Cotton. Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products.

Find out more here: https://bettercotton.org/who-we-are/our-logo/

name: 3-Stripes 1/4 Cotton Leggings
description:
Soft and stretchy leggings with a classic look and sporty vibe.Slide into comfort with these adidas 3-Stripes leggings. Inspired by our rich sporting heritage yet crafted for today, they combine an iconic design with easy-wear materials. The comfortable cotton blend and single jersey fabric move with you, whether you're hanging out at home or running errands around town. Signature 3-Stripes down the sides stand as a bold reminder of the legacy behind this style.
 
The cotton in this product has been sourced through Better Cotton. Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products.

name: Y-3 AEROREADY Running Shorts
description:
Y-3 shorts for long-distance running, made in part with recycled and renewable materials.In collaboration with adidas Running, Y-3 fuses sports performance and high fashion — limiting distraction and enhancing performance in the process. The Running Shorts are crafted from extremely lightweight, durable fabric with split hems to help you move freely and naturally. Moisture-absorbing AEROREADY technology keeps you dry, focused and comfortable as the miles fall behind you.
