Even the smallest details, like the premium rib knit that creates a hugging fit and subtle texture, drive home the mood. Keep the '70s vibes alive by adding flared leggings or dolphin cut shorts.

name: adidas by Stella McCartney TruePace Tank Top
description:
An ultra-lightweight running top made in part with recycled materials.You're set up for success with this adidas by Stella McCartney running tank top. Super-lightweight, with just the right amount of stretch and a loose shape that lets you move without restriction. The trifecta of comfort, you could say. Not to mention it's crafted with recycled materials.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 60% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Adicolor Trefoil Boxy Tee (Plus Size)
description:
A boxy-fit tee made in part with a blend of recycled and renewable materials.Stand out in comfort wearing this casual tee. It pays tribute to the rich sports heritage of adidas, which has always been about pushing boundaries and the embrace of being bold. Move freely thanks to the oversized cut and cotton blend fabric. Embrace the iconic Trefoil logo and make a statement about your confident style. 

By choosing recycled, we are able to reuse materials that have already been created, which helps to reduce waste. Renewable materials choices will help us to remove our reliance on finite resources. Our products made with a blend of recycled and renewable materials feature at least 70% total of these materials.

name: TERREX Xperior Hybrid Rain Jacket
description: Flexible material, adaptable design and purposeful design pockets.The TERREX Xperior Hybrid RAIN.RDY jacket with waterproof protection is designed for a body in motion. For hikers who want to move with pace, you can do so with ease thanks to outstanding stretch and wind protection. With roomy pockets to stow your essentials at hand, carry what you need protected from the rain. And with an adjustable hood, hems and cuffs, wear it exactly how you want to so you can move how you need to.

A flared golf skirt that was made to be remade.Whether you're playing a casual nine with friends or teeing off on tournament day, this adidas golf skirt brings feminine style to your round. The twill construction feels lightweight and breathable, and an elastic waistband offers comfortable flex as you swing and bend. Stash extra tees and markers in the pockets and you're good to go.

name: Ultimate365 Tour PRIMEKNIT Sleeveless Polo Shirt
description:
A golf polo made in part with a blend of recycled and renewable materials.Tee off in tour style in this sleeveless golf polo shirt. It's made of seamless adidas PRIMEKNIT that's precision-engineered for comfort, with plenty of stretch for unrestricted movement. The breathable build features a half-zip collar that you can adjust for increased ventilation. 

A minimum of 70% of this product is a blend of recycled and renewable materials.

name: TERREX 3-Layer Post-Consumer Nylon Snow Pants
description: Waterproof ski pants made in part with recycled content.Explore the backcountry and free ride in style in our new 3L post-consumer nylon Freeride Pants. A 3 layer technical fabric made from recycled post consumer nylon, these snow pants will protect you from snow and the wind with a 20,000 /10,000 waterproof breathability rating. They keep your temperature right and the elements out all day long.

name: Golden Knights Fleece Top
description: A heavy-duty fleece top for Golden Knights fans.Whether you're training outside or watching a hockey game in the arena, take shelter in this adidas Vegas Golden Knights pullover. The thick fleece will keep you toasty until the action on the ice or your workout heats up. Laser-cut vents out back ensure you stay ventilated.

name: Techfit Volleyball Shorts
description: Streamlined shorts for the volleyball court.Look good. Feel good. Play better. These adidas Techfit volleyball shorts give you one less thing to worry about on the court. Made from stretchy fabric that flexes with your movement, they deliver a locked-in feel that supports every jump and dive. The pre-curved waistband will keep you comfortable point after point.

name: TERREX Agravic Windweave Pro Trail Running Windbreaker
description:
Tech-heavy jacket that provides huge protection in a pocket-sized package.Pack light. Move fast. The Terrex Agravic Windweave Pro Wind Jacket keeps you motivated on the trails during windswept days. 

Body-mapping technology creates differential air permeability to block out wind and rain, while simultaneously letting body vapor escape. The jacket is lighter than ever thanks to Windweave Pro — a fabric that is 50% lighter than the original Windweave material. The trail running packet-it solution means you can easily pack the jacket down into an inner mesh pocket when the sun comes out.

name: Club Tennis Pleated Skirt
description:
A moisture-absorbing tennis skirt made in part with recycled materials.Style and performance for the tennis court. This adidas Club skirt incorporates mesh pleats for an eye-catching look and an airy feel. Created with a bit of stretch, the soft fabric makes every sprint and slide a breeze while built-in tights add confidence. Moisture-absorbing AEROREADY keeps you dry and in control, point after point.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: adidas x Marimekko Tennis Dress
description: Express yourself in a vibrant dress made in part with recycled materials.Designed to empower and inspire. This adidas x Marimekko tennis dress is all about self-expression on court. Done up in one of the world-famous design house's bold prints, it'll keep you confident point after point thanks to its soft fabric and moisture-absorbing AEROREADY. The stretchy construction and flared skirt support every darting sprint and booming forehand as you make a statement with your play.

name: Z.N.E. Shorts
description:
Comfortable shorts made with a blend of recycled and renewable materials.Tuning into yourself is part of the process. Between those moments when you're powered up, let these ultra-comfortable high-rise shorts from adidas help you get your mind and body right where they need to be — in the zone. Your zone. Four-way stretch fabric ensures unrestricted movement. A concealed elastic waist and flowing fit give them a futuristic look. A concealed zip pocket keeps your essentials secure.

A minimum of 70% of this product is a blend of recycled and renewable materials.

name: Y-3 Relaxed Short Sleeve Tee
description: A Y-3 t-shirt with a subtle logo look.A Y-3 essential receives a fresh update. The Relaxed Short Sleeve Tee has a modern, loose cut made of comfortable single jersey cotton. A tonal, soft-to-the-touch Y-3 logo makes its mark on the sleeve.

name: adidas by Stella McCartney 7/8 Yoga Leggings
description:
Above-the-ankle yoga tights for any day.There's no such thing as too many yoga tights, especially not if you aim to integrate sports into your day. The adidas by Stella McCartney 7/8 yoga leggings have a classic cut that's executed in solid colors to create the perfect silhouette for every time you hit the studio.

Made in part with recycled polyester, these tights feel like second skin with every stretch, bend, and twist while securely resting above your ankles. The soft fabric is fitted to flow with your body and leave you feeling dry thanks to the AEROREADY technology. 

Throw on an oversized sweater or t-shirt, and you can head straight to breakfast after your morning yoga class. With these leggings, you can't go wrong.

name: Techrock Ultralight 1/2-Zip Hooded Fleece Jacket
description: A versatile fleece midlayer designed with mobility in mind.Dawn patrol starts. Exposed summit pitches. This adidas hooded fleece is the versatile midlayer you can wear through it all. Engineered for breathability and mobility, it maintains a lightweight minimalist design for easy packing and a wide range of wear. High-reach patterning lets you make every move without restriction, while a body-mapped material mix adds breathability where you need it most and durability and comfort where essential. A high collar and hood add the extra level of warmth needed for short summit stays and changing weather.

A water-resistant jacket made in collaboration with National Geographic.Nature is a masterpiece. See it up close in the new collab with National Geographic — high-tech gear for spirited explorers.   

Epic adventures await in the RAIN.RDY Jacket. Crafted from water-resistant fabric, the jacket is printed with a shot of the ethereal White Sands National Park in New Mexico. The dune-inspired color palette and thoughtful design details — like easily-accessible pockets, a stowaway hood, and elongated sleeves with velcro — allow you to push your limits in comfort and utilitarian style. Easily stash the light-weight jacket in your pack when things heat up on the trail. The jacket is signed off with a logo that changes between Terrex and National Geographic depending on the perspective.

name: Studio Tee
description:
A knot-back tee made in part with recycled materials.Step in the studio, and the rest of the day falls away. Dial into the moment in this adidas knot-back training t-shirt. With its soft feel and loose cut, you have the freedom to dance, stretch and twist. Throw in moisture-absorbing AEROREADY, and you're covered when the workout turns up a notch.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Ultimate365 Tour Frostguard Vest
description:
An insulated golf vest made in part with recycled materials.Cold weather doesn't have to affect your game. Zip up in this adidas golf vest and play low through chilly, damp conditions. Lightweight insulation keeps your core warm without added bulk, and full-swing stretch ensures complete mobility from tee to green. A durable, water-resistant finish sheds mist and light rain to keep you dry and comfortable through the last hole. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Powerreact Training Medium-Support Techfit Bra
description: An adidas bra for intense sessions, made in part with recycled materials.Layer up or wear this adidas training bra solo. Either way, it's your go-to bra for high-impact workouts. It has a sleek and compressive feel that provides distraction-free comfort and all-day support. No matter how hard you push yourself, it'll feel dry, thanks to moisture-absorbing AEROREADY. Mesh details offer airflow in high-sweat zones for cool relief. Remove the pads or don't, so it feels right to you.

name: Reflect At Night X-City Running Cover-Up
description:
A lightweight running jacket with reflective details."The X-City Reflect At Night collection was made with your next run in mind. The range combines sleek silhouettes with fluorescent elements for maximum style points, while visibility markers highlight biological motion. Biomotion uses the innate ability of humans to recognize the movements of other humans by their motions" — Senior Designer Men's Running Apparel, Benedikt Lüdke

Chase your runner's high in the sleek X-City Reflect At Night Mesh Running Jacket. With glow-in-the-dark mesh fabric and fast-charging and long-lasting glow-in-the-dark foil, the jacket is a stylish choice for your next run. Crafted from lightweight material and cut for a regular, slightly boxy fit, the jacket features thoughtful details — like a zipped pocket and adjustable hem — for your smoothest stride yet. Not intended for use as Personal Protective Equipment (PPE).

name: Marathon 20 Allover Print Shorts (Plus Size)

AEROREADY handles moisture for the duration, and lightweight inner briefs offer comfort and coverage. Tuck your key and cash in the inside pocket to keep them secure until you need them.

Made with 100% recycled materials, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Leggings

name: Terrex Xperior 2L Insulated RAIN.RDY Jacket
description:
A waterproof and insulated ski jacket made in part with recycled materials.Zip up in warmth and weather protection that lets you take on cold lift rides and stormy ski days in comfort with the Terrex Xperior 2L Insulated RAIN.RDY Jacket. 

Using advanced waterproofing materials and construction, it's designed to keep the water out, while low-profile PrimaLoft® synthetic insulation seals in warmth. Skier-designed features like an integrated snow skirt and zip vents help you adapt to changing conditions. A dedicated pass pocket and an attached lens cloth make for smooth days on the mountain, while a mix of pockets inside and out offer secure storage for your phone and other ski-day essentials.

Made with a series of recycled materials and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

This product is made with a yarn that features 50% recycled polyester and 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — waste which we intercepted from remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines in order to prevent it from polluting our oceans. In total, this product has 70% recycled content.

name: adidas by Stella McCartney TruePace Cycling Shorts
description: Signature high-rise bike shorts with a zipped pocket for working out and everyday wear.Bike shorts are the trend that just won't quit. Rendered in playful hues with signature contrasting lines along the leg, the adidas by Stella McCartney TruePace Cycling Shorts are a fashion-forward example of why. Adding an aerodynamic burst of casual-cool to both your everyday and workout wardrobe, the shorts have a sculptural high-rise silhouette and are designed to fit like a glove. name: Made With Nature Golf Skort

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Blue Version 83-C Dress

It seals out stormy conditions while letting your body breathe and move without restriction as you hike, mountaineer and explore. A fully adjustable, helmet-compatible hood offers full shelter from the storm. And when the wet weather clears, roll this anorak into its hood and secure it to your pack using the cord and hook enclosure. Customize the fit and make adjustments in snowy weather with easy-to-manipulate pulls and zips.

name: Color Fade Jersey Shorts

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future. 

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products, however, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source." 

Find out more here: bettercotton.org/learnmore

A running bra made in part with Parley Ocean Plastic.Push through tough runs without missing a beat in this medium-support bra from adidas. This product is made with a yarn that features 50% recycled polyester and 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — plastic waste which we intercepted from remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines in order to prevent it from polluting our oceans. In total, this product has 70% recycled content.

This sports bra is the most supportive gym partner you've ever had. The tight fit, adjustable racerback, and cup design keep everything in place whenever you're doing HIIT, an indoor cycling class, or any other medium-intensity workout.

A celebration of self-expression, imagination and the unwavering belief that love unites, the collaboration explores fluidity, color and patterns. This partnership is one part of our effort to honor the LGBTQIA+ community alongside our Global Purpose partners, Athlete Ally and Stonewall UK.

Celebrate color and culture. Created in collaboration with designer Rich Mnisi, this adidas cycling jersey shares his Love Unites theme to fuel rides short and long. The jersey's soft, stretchy fit cuts a clean silhouette without feeling restrictive. Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Made With Nature Golf Skort (Plus Size)
description:
A stretchy golf skort that's made with nature.You don't have to choose between comfort and style. This adidas golf skort delivers both. The soft, stretchy build features a wide waistband that feels snug and supportive throughout your round. Attached inner shorts let you swing and bend with confidence, and gripper elastic on the legs keeps them in place as you move. 

This golf skort is made with natural and renewable materials as part of our journey to design out finite resources and help end plastic waste.

name: adidas by Stella McCartney 7/8 Yoga Leggings
description:
Above-the-ankle yoga tights for any day.There's no such thing as too many yoga tights, especially not if you aim to integrate sports into your day. The adidas by Stella McCartney 7/8 yoga leggings have a classic cut that's executed in solid colors to create the perfect silhouette for every time you hit the studio.

Made in part with recycled polyester, these tights feel like second skin with every stretch, bend, and twist while securely resting above your ankles. The soft fabric is fitted to flow with your body and leave you feeling dry thanks to the AEROREADY technology. 

Throw on an oversized sweater or t-shirt, and you can head straight to breakfast after your morning yoga class. With these leggings, you can't go wrong.

name: Melbourne Tennis Y-Tank Top
description: A cooling tank top with a message of hope, made to rethink our materials.Created for the Southern Hemisphere's most prestigious tennis tournament, this tank top highlights a brand-new approach to carbon recycling. Built using yarn that includes captured industrial emissions, it also has cooling HEAT.RDY so you can rely on your top to battle the heat while you overcome your opponent. Around the back, that Y-shaped strap is ergonomically designed to give your shoulders full rotation for huge hits.

name: adidas by Stella McCartney TruePace Running Crop Top
description:
A stylish running crop top with a tight fitTake advantage of every ray of sun on your run when you go for a run in the adidas by Stella McCartney TruePace Running Crop Top. With its bold colors, signature printed lines, and close fit, the top shows off your style and your figure.

Thanks to the soft fabric's ability to keep you cool and dry, you'll be sure to stay focused and in the zone throughout your run. You'll feel supported with every stride thanks to the high collar and racer-back, while the cropped length and sleeveless design leave you the freedom to move. In our effort to help end plastic waste, the top is made with 79% recycled polyester and 21% elastane.

The cropped length combines perfectly with the high waistband of the adidas by Stella McCartney TruePace running shorts or cycling tights.

name: adidas Basketball Sleeveless Sweatshirt
description:
A sleeveless sweatshirt built with versatility in mind.The next chapter of adidas Basketball is an exploration in form, function and color. A curated collection, built to fit the needs of the modern athlete. This sleeveless sweatshirt is made of polyester and cotton premium fleece and features a ribbed mockneck.

Our cotton products support more sustainable cotton farming.
color: Halo Green S21 / Halo Green S21

description:
A short sleeve volleyball jersey made in part with recycled materials.Cut out for the volleyball court. This adidas HILO jersey combines stretchy fabric and a fit that supports overhead play. Moisture-wicking AEROREADY keeps you comfortable during intense action, and the droptail hem has you covered during every dive and leap. Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 60% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Adicolor Trefoil Boxy Tee
description:
A boxy-fit tee made in part with a blend of recycled and renewable materials.Stand out in comfort wearing this casual tee. It pays tribute to the rich sports heritage of adidas, which has always been about pushing boundaries and the embrace of being bold. Move freely thanks to the oversized cut and cotton blend fabric. Embrace the iconic Trefoil logo and make a statement about your confident style. 

By choosing recycled, we are able to reuse materials that have already been created, which helps to reduce waste. Renewable materials choices will help us to remove our reliance on finite resources. Our products made with a blend of recycled and renewable materials feature at least 70% total of these materials.

name: Terrex Xperior Merino 150 Baselayer Long Sleeve Tee
description:
This Merino baselayer long sleeve tee is made with nature.Adventure into extreme terrain with this Merino baselayer from adidas Terrex against your skin. Designed for performance, this versatile long sleeve combines insulating Merino wool with breathable lyocell, so you stay dry and comfortable out in the wild. It's made of fabrics that regulate your body temperature in the harshest climates, so head into the mountains knowing you'll be protected from the elements. With flatlock seams against your skin, experience chafe-free comfort. Merino wool neutralizes odor and manages moisture, so you can explore for longer.

This Merino baselayer long sleeve tee is made with natural and renewable materials as part of our journey to design out finite resources and help end plastic waste.

name: Designed for Training 2-in-1 Shorts (Plus Size)

Moisture-absorbing AEROREADY technology keeps you comfortably dry through the toughest sweat sessions. Side slits and a stash pocket on the inner tight offer functionality. 

This product is made with at least 70% recycled materials. By reusing materials that have already been created, we help to reduce waste and our reliance on finite resources and reduce the footprint of the products we make.

A comfortable, stretchy crop top with a flash of 3-Stripes style.A road map of our heritage, this adidas crop top traces the roots that led us here. The cotton in this product has been sourced through Better Cotton. Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products.

Find out more here: https://bettercotton.org/who-we-are/our-logo/

name: TERREX Xperior GORE-TEX Paclite Rain Jacket
description: Reliable, waterproof outer layer that packs down into a pocket.Short and simple or long and winding, when you pursue adventure, a reliable waterproof is essential. The TERREX XPERIOR outer jacket features a GORE-TEX PACLITE outer fabric that provides waterproofing while remaining breathable when the hike gets more intense and the rain starts falling. While the YKK Aquaguard zippers are water-repellant, the adjustable cuffs and hem allow you to customize it to your needs. The jacket is packable, so folds away easily. Plus, the integrated visor in the hood keeps the rain at bay and helps you maintain good visibility even when the rain is getting stronger.

An allover print, workout bra with adidas Techfit and a hidden message.Feel ready to reset and mindfully move in the Lift Your Mind collection. Designed for comfort and strength inside and out, the capsule line delivers thoughtful fit and fabric choices in stylish colors.

Get the support to do more of what you love in the Lift Your Mind PowerReact Medium-Support Bra. Crafted from soft, lightweight fabric, this bra's designed to set you up with a strong foundation, so you feel confident to express yourself. Cut-out straps are an eye-catching detail, alongside a nature-inspired print to help lift your energy. A hidden message on the inside encourages you to find what moves you: "it's about progress not perfection."

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future. 

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products, however, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source."

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future. 

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products, however, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source."

For real change to happen, we need to accelerate towards decarbonization. To do that we first need to understand the impact we are already making so we can improve and have a bar to raise.

From raw material extraction, processing, packaging, all the way to the end of product's life, we measured the carbon footprint (CO2e) of this product, conforming to an internationally recognized standard: ISO 14067.

name: adidas by Stella McCartney TruePurpose Power Impact Training Medium-Support Bra
description:

Laser-cut perforations circulate air for even more comfort, and removable pads offer extra support and shape.

This product is made with a yarn that features 50% recycled polyester and 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — plastic waste which we intercepted from remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines in order to prevent it from polluting our oceans. In total, this product has 70% recycled content.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.

name: adidas by Stella McCartney 7/8 Yoga Leggings
description:
Above-the-ankle yoga tights for any day.There's no such thing as too many yoga tights, especially not if you aim to integrate sports into your day. The adidas by Stella McCartney 7/8 yoga leggings have a classic cut that's executed in solid colors to create the perfect silhouette for every time you hit the studio.

Made in part with recycled polyester, these tights feel like second skin with every stretch, bend, and twist while securely resting above your ankles. The soft fabric is fitted to flow with your body and leave you feeling dry thanks to the AEROREADY technology. 

Throw on an oversized sweater or t-shirt, and you can head straight to breakfast after your morning yoga class. With these leggings, you can't go wrong.

name: Optime Power Short Leggings
description:
High-rise short leggings with a 'second-skin' feel and waist pocket.Whether it's legs or arms day, evolve into the strongest version of yourself in comfort and style with the Optime Power Short Leggings. 

Featuring all the design elements you'll need for your next sweat sesh, the shorts are crafted from peach-soft, stretchy interlock fabric and cut for a flattering second-skin fit. The high-rise waist offers confident coverage as you move through your reps, while the integrated waist pocket is on-hand to store your small essentials. Using sweat-wicking or absorbent materials, AEROREADY keeps you feeling dry — even in intense workouts. They also have a stylish allover embossed graphic to keep you looking as good as you feel. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: ALL SZN Washed Tee
description:
A soft, baggy tee with a stylish crop cut for your daily look.It's the casual feel of a soft pullover in the form of a crop tee. This adidas ALL SZN t-shirt comes in a loose fit for a baggy silhouette. Embroidered lettering and a tonal adidas Badge of Sport sign off the look.

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future.

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain-of-custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products. However, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source."

Find out more here: bettercotton.org/learnmore

name: Y-3 Fuzzy Fleece Vest
description: A fuzzy Y-3 vest with snap buttons.A harmonious exploration of fashion and function, the Y-3 Fuzzy Fleece Vest leans on the outdoors for inspiration. It's crafted from a premium wool blend with a textured jacquard execution. Snaps on the sides and down the center front open up the relaxed silhouette, allowing for a personalized fit.

name: Island Club Mini Skirt
description:
A slim-fitting mini skirt with stylish, color-blocked 3-Stripes."The inspiration behind the adidas Originals Island Club collection pulls from the energy of vacations, summer fun and poolside vibes. It's colorful and playful, alongside the archive related graphic and logo placement, so you can be dressed from the beach to the beach club." — Womenswear Designer, Nadine Redlingshoefer 
 
Carry that summertime feeling throughout the year with the Island Club Mini Skirt. Its stylish length and playful colors are supported by soft French Terry fabric with stretch — for beach lounging and strolling alike. Signature 3-Stripes on each side bring in a touch of sport and an elastic waist makes comfort a priority. Dress it up or keep it casual — it's ready for both.

name: Essentials Rib Long Sleeve Tee
description: A ribbed tee with clean lines.Inspired by sporty looks from our archives, this adidas tee takes a fresh stance with a crew neck and ribbed design. Long sleeves give it clean lines, and the stretchy, slim fit shapes itself around you. Layer this one under a jacket or blazer, or rock it solo for a modern vibe.

name: Y-3 Wool Flannel Shirt
description: A utilitarian button-up Y-3 shirt.The Y-3 Wool Flannel Shirt is an exploration of functionality in the world of fashion. The loose silhouette has a classic look with buttons down the front and on the cuffs.

name: Trefoil Big Logo Tee
description:
A breezy tee made in part with a blend of recycled and renewable materials.The airflow of a tank top with the cut of a boxy tee. That's what you get with this adidas design, which combines two looks into one versatile style. Printed on soft cotton jersey, an oversized Trefoil logo shows up proud. The mesh overlay adds texture and visual appeal, plus freedom to move thanks to stretchy elastane. Dress It up or down — this one is your call. 

A minimum of 70% of this product is a blend of recycled and renewable materials.

name: Adicolor Classics Tight Summer Dress
description:
This playful dress fits slim and lets you feel the sun on your back.Birds chirping. Sun shining. There's no reason to stay inside when you can go show off this adidas dress. Its slim and stretchy build celebrates your every curve, with cotton that feels deliciously soft against your skin. While the 3-Stripes couldn't be more authentic, the open back adds a modern edge.

Our cotton products support more sustainable cotton farming.

name: Own the Run Hooded Running Windbreaker
description:
A packable running windbreaker made for everyday running.Whether you're hitting the pavement with your community or on your own, there's nothing quite like the joyful rush of a runner's high. One thing's for sure: comfort and support are paramount in maximizing your daily dose of endorphins. 

Introducing the Own The Run Hooded Running Windbreaker — the perfect companion to keep you moving when the weather is less than ideal. WIND.RDY technology is designed to keep you going in windy weather, while reflective details light up in low light conditions. Don't let the elements slow you down — zip up the windbreaker and tackle any challenge that comes your way.

name: Adicolor Essentials Fleece Slim Joggers (Plus Size)
description:
Cozy fleece joggers with a slim fit.Sometimes you look in your closet to get ready and you're like, "Yeah, nope." What you start the day off in is also what can get you through it — and yes, we're talking about these adidas joggers. Stay in them all day long, which means stay comfortable all day long. The soft fleece build makes sure of it.

Our cotton products support more sustainable cotton farming.

name: Allover Zebra Animal Print Essentials Tee
description:
A zebra print tee for bold everyday style.Let yourself be loud. From first glance, this adidas tee stands out thanks to a bold allover graphic zebra print. Cotton jersey fabric provides just the right amount of stretch for a comfortable fit. A Trefoil logo on the chest completes the look.

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future. 

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products, however, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source." 

Find out more here:bettercotton.org/learnmore

name: Y-3 Mock Neck Tee
description: A loose Y-3 mock-neck t-shirt.The Y-3 Mock Neck Tee exudes sophistication though simplicity. A classic foundational piece, it's fabricated from soft cotton jersey material. It has a loose silhouette and is finished with narrow, double-needle stitching.

name: Always Original Tank Dress
description:
A fluid, playful dress made in part with recycled materials.The only person who defines your expression is you. A belief held closely by The Collective, part of the adidas Always Originals collection, and a mindset that is strongly encouraged with this dress. Every part of the bold, unapologetic style calls for attention. The futuristic pop art print creates a visual exploration of textures and layers to imitate an iridescent effect. A higher cut on the front contrasts with the low back, which allows for the look to continuously surprise from different angles. The body-hugging shape was fit on feminine and masculine bodies of all shapes, celebrating our individuality in all of its forms.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Studio Tee
description:
A knot-back tee made in part with recycled materials.Step in the studio, and the rest of the day falls away. Dial into the moment in this adidas knot-back training t-shirt. With its soft feel and loose cut, you have the freedom to dance, stretch and twist. Throw in moisture-absorbing AEROREADY, and you're covered when the workout turns up a notch.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Adicolor Rib Swimsuit
description:
A soft ribbed swimsuit made in part with recycled materials.In a busy, crowded world, simplicity makes the biggest statement of all. That's the case with this adidas swimsuit. Its clean lines and super-soft ribbed material make it a go-to for days spent in sand and surf. The open back and high-cut legs give it a stylish silhouette.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Optime Stash Pocket Training 7/8 Leggings (Plus Size)
description:
Versatile high-rise workout leggings made in part with recycled materials.No matter which way you move, these training leggings are your new go-to pair. Cardio to leg day, you're ready, as these leggings have a slick, smooth feel and supportive four-way stretch. Focus on your reps and beating your personal goals, thanks to a seamless design on the sides and a comfortable high-rise waist. AEROREADY manages moisture, so you'll feel good all workout long. Stash your essentials in the thigh pocket to keep them handy.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Terrex Multi Light Fleece Full-Zip Jacket
description:
A warm yet breathable jacket made in part with recycled materials.The ideal adventuring companion, this warm top is light and streamlined to let you move with ease. Wear this adidas Terrex fleece jacket under your hiking jacket for extra coziness, or over a tee when the weather's mild. Made with Terrex honeycomb Flooce fabric, it wicks away moisture and lets your body breathe, so you stay comfortable on your travels. Zip pockets keep your valuables securely by your side.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: adidas by Stella McCartney TrueNature Poncho
description:
A cozy poncho with an adjustable hood and allover nature-inspired print.This season of adidas by Stella McCartney is a stylish reminder of the joy that comes with moving your body in nature. Technical details are fused with fashion-forward, Earth-inspired design motifs, from psychedelic trees and camouflage patterns to moiré wood prints. The collection honors the incomparable beauty of the natural world, inspiring you to take the gym outside. 

Fashion meets functionality in the adidas by Stella McCartney TrueNature Poncho, the ideal sartorial accompaniment for cooler days. Crafted from luxe water-resistant fabric and cut for a chic loose fit, the poncho features exposed front zippers for easy accessibility on the trails. The adjustable hood was designed to fit over helmets for your next outdoor ride, while the allover nature-inspired print and adidas x Stella McCartney logo will have you looking as good as you feel while you workout.
color: Beige Tone / Deep Lilac / Trace Olive

name: TERREX 3-Layer Post-Consumer Nylon Snow Jacket
description:
A waterproof ski jacket made in part with recycled content.Explore the backcountry and free ride in style in our new 3L post-consumer nylon Freeride Jacket.
A 3 layer technical fabric made using recycled post consumer nylon, this ski jacket will protect you from snow and wind. With a 20,000 / 10,000 waterproof breathability rating, they keep your temperature right and the elements out all day long.

name: Long Sleeve Bodysuit (Plus Size)
description: A super shiny two-piece bodysuit that can be worn multiple ways.You have three looks in one with this super high-shine adidas top. Separately, here's what you get — a turtleneck bodysuit that loves your shape with a stretchy fit, and then a bolero top that stands out with the iconic 3-Stripes. Together, you get a statement style that takes some influence from the world of '80s aerobics. However you wear it, there's no shortage of fun to be had, or comfort to be felt.

name: PowerImpact Training Medium-Support Bra
description:
A soft and stretchy racerback bra for all the ways you play.Power up your workout in the PowerImpact Training Medium-Support Bra. 

Designed for activities like training, volleyball, tennis and cycling, the versatile bra has a pullover racerback design, strap stabilizers and a wide band to keep it in place. Removable pads let you customize the coverage. Using sweat-wicking or absorbent materials, AEROREADY keeps you feeling dry — even in intense workouts. The bra also has a stylish allover embossed graphic to keep you looking as good as you feel. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Tank Top
description:
A slim-fit tank top with adidas Originals style.Ready for a tank that's ready to relax? This adidas top invites you right along. Made with cotton for softness and elastane for stretch, it's the perfect pick for take-it-easy days when comfort is essential. Timeless 3-Stripes add a punch of energy, and a slim fit keeps close to you in the most flattering way. The finishing touch: "Originals" in distinctive Gothic-style lettering on the front. 

Our cotton products support more sustainable cotton farming.

name: TERREX Multi Full-Zip Fleece Jacket
description: A versatile fleece jacket made with recycled materials.Mountain hike or city day, zip into this versatile adidas fleece jacket and keep moving. Waffle grid fleece increases warmth and breathability, making it an excellent layer under a waterproof jacket or as a standalone piece. Side pockets secure your everyday carry stuff whether you're on the trail or just running errands around town.

name: Power AEROREADY 2-in-1 Shorts
description:
Two-in-one training shorts made in part with recycled materials.Close your eyes and will yourself the energy to push through the toughest workouts. These adidas shorts make sure nothing stands in your way. The inner shorts support your muscles and have bonded seams to reduce chafing. The outer shorts are made with a stretchy, satiny fabric for a barely there feel that goes wherever you do. Both layers feature AEROREADY to keep you dry and focused on your goals.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: adidas ADI DASSLER Graphic Tee
description:
A classic tee with a friendly attitude to put out the positive vibes.Thumbs up if you're ready for a good day ahead. This adidas tee is all about an optimistic outlook — like the one sported by the animated Trefoil on the front and back. Why so cheery? Probably because it's so comfortable, sitting on pure cotton single jersey for all-day softness. 

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future.

name: Always Original Skirt
description:
A layered skirt made in part with a blend of recycled and renewable materials.This adidas skirt redefines an old-school style with a double waistband detail for a layered look. The stretchy cotton-blend fabric and elastic waist create a comfortable fit you'll feel good in all day long. Signature 3-Stripes down the sides and a Trefoil logo round out the look, so you're ready to step out in style.

A minimum of 70% of this product is a blend of recycled and renewable materials.

name: adidas by Stella McCartney TrueStrength Long Sleeve Top
description:
A luxe, seamless crop top for yoga with a 'second-skin' feel."This adidas by Stella McCartney collection revisits iconic designs with a mix of form-fitting, super stretchy pieces and baggier silhouettes. The confidence-enhancing range is in tune with the everyday lives of busy modern women. Stylish cut-out details, muted tones and peach-soft fabrics combine for pieces that seamlessly transition from the studio to the city and beyond. 

The adidas by Stella McCartney Long Sleeve Crop Top is the chicest incentive there is to sign up for a Yoga or Pilates class. Designed for a flattering second-skin fit, the top is rendered in a fashion-forward, muted color palette for maximum versatility. The unbelievably soft material and seamless design enhance comfort and mobility — whether you're stretching it out in class or heading to brunch afterwards. "
color: Magic Earth / Soft Almond-Smc / Burnt Cayenne-Smc

name: Stretchy Allover Print Pants
description: Sporty, chic and cozy, these pants are made in part with recycled materials.Look luxe while you lounge. How? Just pull on these adidas pants. Stretchy interlock fabric feels luscious against your skin while the Trefoil monogram print adds a chic touch. Pair them with a crop top and spend the day around your house, or throw on a crop hoodie and some sneakers and you're set to meet up with friends.

name: Allover Mini Crest Logo Hoodie
description:
A cozy hooded sweatshirt that looks to our golf archives for inspiration.Shoot for your best. This adidas Originals hoodie offers a fresh spin on a classic design. Crafted from a cotton French terry for a truly plush feel, this relaxed-fit sweatshirt stands out from the crowd thanks to its allover Trefoil crest print, inspired by our golfing archive. An embroidered metallic Trefoil logo adds an extra hint of shine. Traditional with a twist, this fun hoodie will keep you cozy and comfortable, no matter where the day takes you.

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future.

name: RAIN.RDY Pants
description: Waterproof golf rain pants made with recycled materials.All weather is good weather when you're prepared to stay warm and dry. These waterproof, breathable golf rain pants set you up to play through steady drizzle or a passing shower. RAIN.RDY seals out wet weather to keep you dry and comfortable. The lightweight, three-layer build features soft, quiet material with plenty of stretch that doesn't disturb your focus. Zip pockets add utility for storing tees, phone or balls. Zip ankles make for easier on and off.

name: Mexico Women's Team 23 Away Jersey
description: A jersey inspired by nature, created for fans and made with Parley Ocean Plastic.Inspired by the ocean's hidden beauty. The mesmerizing graphic on this adidas Mexico away jersey captures the majesty of the whale shark. Standing out against its spotted allover print, a woven team badge shows your soccer support runs deep. Built to keep fans comfortable, this shirt combines moisture-absorbing AEROREADY and breathable mesh inserts.

name: Power Cropped Tee
description:
A soft, tight-fit crop tee made in part with recycled materials.Build your strength and step up to the bar in functional style with the Power Cropped Tee. 

The raglan sleeve design with an underarm panel lets you lift without restriction, maximizing your range of motion when you need it most, while the crew neck and cropped length add pared-back style. Using sweat-wicking or absorbent materials, AEROREADY keeps you feeling dry — even in intense workouts. They also have a stylish allover embossed graphic to keep you looking as good as you feel. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Y-3 Quilted Vest
description: A padded Y-3 vest.Two things are at play with the Y-3 Quilted Vest — a utilitarian aesthetic and a representation of speed. A design inspired by the adidas Originals Aloxe track suit is subtly integrated into the quilted build. The relaxed fit makes it easy to layer, and PrimaLoft® insulation locks in the heat.

name: adidas Yoga Studio 7/8 Leggings
description: Second-skin yoga tights made in part with recycled materials.Bring a yoga mindset with you wherever you go. These adidas training tights perform on or off the mat. Adisoft is super soft and supportive, to contour the body in motion. AEROREADY takes care of moisture when you start to build heat. The high waist hugs you in and stays in place as you move.

name: Y-3 3-Stripes Short Sleeve Tee
description: A Y-3 tee that plays with the classic 3-Stripes.One of adidas' most signature markers — the 3-Stripes — is highlighted on the Y-3 3-Stripes Short Sleeve Tee. The shirt is crafted with soft cotton for a loose fit and detailed with open raglan seams, engineered 3-Stripes and side slits.

name: TLRD Impact Luxe Training High-Support Bra
description: A bra tailored for high support.No limits. No distractions. When you're giving your all to high-intensity workouts like boxing and HIIT class, this adidas bra gives the support you need. Count on stability, thanks to the sleek fabric and underwire. Because sweat is part of the process, HEAT.RDY keeps you cool, dry and focused on finding your power.

name: Pride Shorts
description:
Shorts designed with Rich Mnisi, made in part with recycled content.Let love be your legacy. South African designer Rich Mnisi once wrote that reminder in a handwritten letter to his younger queer self, and today it thrives at the core of the adidas x Rich Mnisi Pride Collection. A celebration of self-expression, imagination and the unwavering belief that love unites, the collaboration explores fluidity, color and patterns. This partnership is one part of our effort to honor the LGBTQIA+ community alongside our Global Purpose partner, Athlete Ally.

Abstract art and comfort join forces in these eye-catching adidas shorts. Bold shapes create a contrasting collage accented by 3-Stripes in vibrant color. A fully elastic waistband offers the perfect fit, and front pockets cleverly conceal essentials on the go. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: adidas by Stella McCartney TrueCasuals Woven Track Jacket
description:
An oversized jacket for training with an allover nature-inspired print.This season of adidas by Stella McCartney is a stylish reminder of the joy that comes with moving your body in nature. Technical details are fused with fashion-forward, Earth-inspired design motifs, from psychedelic trees and camouflage patterns to moiré wood prints. The collection honors the incomparable beauty of the natural world, inspiring you to take the gym outside. 

With its chic oversized silhouette and water-repellent finish, the adidas by Stella McCartney TrueCasuals Woven Track Jacket is a comfortable yet stylish addition to your outdoor workout wardrobe. The bungee-adjustable sleeves were designed with versatility in mind, while the two front pockets allow you to stash essentials while you're on the go — from trail snacks to keys. The allover print is an elegant nod to Mother Nature.

name: AEROREADY Train Essentials Woven Quarter-Zip Track Jacket
description:
A quarter-zip jacket made with recycled materials.Whether you're training indoors or out, this adidas track jacket keeps you ready for your warmup, cool-down and everything in between. Made of a soft yet durable material, it stretches when you need it to and stays breathable throughout your session. Front snap pockets keep the must-haves close, and the quarter-zip design lets you ventilate whenever you want. Not that you'll really need to — AEROREADY manages moisture for comfort and a cool, dry feel.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: adidas x Parley Tee (Gender Neutral)
description:
A loose-fit allover print t-shirt made in collaboration with Parley for the Oceans.You and nature are one in this soft adidas t-shirt. Its unique allover print takes cues from coral bleaching, highlighting the beauty and fragility of the underwater world that surrounds us. The words printed on the back inspire you and others to protect Mother Nature every chance you get. This tee was made using UNITEFIT — an all-gender fit system that was created with a spectrum of sizes, genders and forms in mind.

Educate and act. Head to Parley for the Oceans website to find out more, sign up and get involved at adidas.com/parley.

name: Power AEROREADY Crop Sleeveless Tee
description:
A crop tee made in part with recycled materials.Every step in your fitness journey builds confidence for the next one. This adidas sleeveless t-shirt is made of soft, stretchy French terry fabric to keep you comfortable as you level up. A racerback underneath gives you freedom of movement, and a partly detached elastic waist keeps the top in place as you push, pull and reach. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: adidas Ski Chic Pants
description:
Ski-inspired pants with suspenders, made in part with recycled content.You may be physically far from the slopes, but the ski vibe is fully present in these adidas pants. They have the high waist and adjustable shoulder straps with buckles — a classic and essential ski look — plus the flared leg that stays tighter on top and then widens around the ankles. 

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.

name: AEROREADY Train Essentials Woven Quarter-Zip Track Jacket
description:

name: Future Icons 3-Stripes Tee
description: A loose fitting tee built for comfort.Find your new everyday top in this loose fitting adidas tee. Made from cotton single jersey and designed with a boxy fit, it's so comfortable you're going to want to incorporate it into every look. Signature 3-Stripes wrap the tee from sleeve to sleeve providing a modern, minimalist look.

name: Parley Swimsuit
description:
A diving-inspired swimsuit made in part with Parley Ocean Plastic.The world's coral reefs are fragile and endangered. Stand with the oceans in this adidas swimsuit. Inspired by Japanese diving culture, it's made of super-soft fabric and has a layered silhouette. A built-in bra with removable pads provides medium support. 

This garment contains at least 40% recycled content in total. Educate and act. Head to Parley for the Oceans website to find out more, sign up and get involved at adidas.com/parley. This garment is made with a yarn which contains 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean.
color: Hazy Emerald S21 / Utility Green / Matte Silver

name: Fast Running Half-Zip Long Sleeve Top
description:
A moisture-wicking half-zip top made in part with recycled materials.On those in-between days when it's not cold enough for a jacket but not warm enough for short sleeves, the right half zip is essential. This light, breathable adidas top is the only one you'll want to reach for. Moisture-absorbing AEROREADY will help keep you dry, and it's simply a fact that every running long sleeve should have thumbholes. They keep your sleeves secure, hands warm and run fun. This half zip takes it one step further with a watch window, so you can check your splits with ease.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Vibrant Print 3-Stripes Cotton Crop Tee
description:
A modern, loose-fit crop tee that brings the energy.You know those days when you need just a little extra optimism? This adidas crop t-shirt supplies it. Sporting tradition in a new way, it fills timeless 3-Stripes with a flash of vibrant, upbeat color. The modern fit is loose and relaxed, letting you easily pair it with high-waisted pants or whatever suits your mood. Made of cotton single jersey, it gives you all the softness with just enough stretch.

name: adidas by Stella McCartney TruePurpose Tank Top
description:
A timeless top for every workout.If you're looking for your go-to top to wear as you focus on your physique, the adidas by Stella McCartney TruePurpose tank is it. The tank top goes with everything in your wardrobe with its timeless, minimalistic design.

From high-intensity workouts to yoga, this top gives you the coverage and support you need. With a tight cut that fits your body like a second skin and an eye-catching racerback, the tank top leaves you feeling cool and well dressed. 

The stretchy fabric is partly made with recycled materials and leaves you feeling dry, thanks to the AEROREADY moisture-wicking fabric. Lasercut details along the front and back show off your shape and provide extra ventilation things get sweaty.

name: Pacer Train Essentials Floral-Print Woven Shorts
description:
Stay-dry floral-print shorts made with recycled materials.Total comfort takes on a splash of style in these adidas shorts. Made with AEROREADY, they keep moisture away so you stay dry. The mid-rise fit is finished with an elastic waist, meaning you'll never need to tug or readjust mid-workout. Cut specifically for freedom of movement, they move with you while flattering your form. An allover abstract floral print blooms a burst of personality right into your look. 

Made with 100% recycled materials, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Ribbed Cuff Leggings
description:
Upgraded leggings made with a blend of recycled and renewable materials.Give your wardrobe a fresh burst of style with these inventive adidas leggings. Inspired by the classic campus look, the stretchy tights bring a new-school attitude to an old-school aesthetic. Thick ribbed hems with engineered 3-Stripes in fun colorways add an extra pop. You'll playfully accentuate both your shape and personality in these creative tights.

A minimum of 70% of this product is a blend of recycled and renewable materials.

name: Y-3 Classic Light Shell Shorts
description:
Breathable running shorts by Y-3."Y-3 is a strong examination of the blend of sport and style and the tension caused by mixing tradition with all that is modern."  — Yohji Yamamoto 

Sport is the DNA of Y-3. The Classic Light Shell Shorts expose it. The lightweight nylon design is incredibly breathable, letting you move forward in absolute comfort. Adjustable zips and seam vents with mesh inserts increase airflow. Invisible zips on the sides hold your small essentials so your hands stay free.

name: Ultimate365 Tour Pleated 15-Inch Golf Skort
description: A stretchy, pleated skort made in part with recycled materials.Classy meets sporty in this adidas golf skort. Play comfortably and swing confidently while you rock this look. Made to withstand competitive rounds, this skort has a wide waistband and a stretchy feel to let you bend your knees with a full range of motion through every swing. Built-in shorts keep you covered from backswing to follow-through.

name: Essentials 3-Stripes French Terry Cuffed Pants
description: Super comfortable pants made with French terry fabric.Throw these adidas pants on to warm up before your workout, and then feel free to wear them for the rest of the day. The slim fit adds a sporty look, while the drawcord on the elastic waist adds security. They are made from all cotton French terry to keep you comfy no matter what your day has in store.

name: TLRD Impact Luxe Training High-Support Bra
description: A bra tailored for high support.No limits. No distractions. When you're giving your all to high-intensity workouts like boxing and HIIT class, this adidas bra gives the support you need. Count on stability, thanks to the sleek fabric and underwire. Because sweat is part of the process, HEAT.RDY keeps you cool, dry and focused on finding your power.

name: adidas by Stella McCartney TrueCasuals Woven Track Pants
description:
Loose-fitting track pants with a nature-inspired print and adjustable cuffs.This season of adidas by Stella McCartney is a stylish reminder of the joy that comes with moving your body in nature. Technical details are fused with fashion-forward, Earth-inspired design motifs, from psychedelic trees and camouflage patterns to moiré wood prints. The collection honors the incomparable beauty of the natural world, inspiring you to take the gym outside. 

Fusing contemporary-cool design with functional details, the adidas by Stella McCartney TrueCasuals Woven Track Pants are perfect for outdoor training in chilly weather. Designed with versatility in mind, they're cut for a relaxed fit with an adjustable drawcord waist and bungee cuffs at the hem. Various pockets allow you to securely stash your essentials while you're on the go, while a water-repellent finish is ideal for drizzly days. Show off your love for Mother Earth thanks to the stylish nature-inspired print.

name: Sportswear Logo Long Sleeve Tee
description:
A soft, everyday tee with classic adidas appeal.Give yourself plenty of outfit options with this adidas t-shirt that looks great tucked in or left out. The bold rubber-print logo adds just the right amount of detail to whatever you're wearing. Made from soft cotton jersey fabric, it holds its shape and delivers all-day comfort. 

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future.  

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain-of-custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products. However, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source." 

Find out more here: bettercotton.org/learnmore

name: adidas by Stella McCartney TruePurpose Tank Top
description:
A timeless top for every workout.If you're looking for your go-to top to wear as you focus on your physique, the adidas by Stella McCartney TruePurpose tank is it. The tank top goes with everything in your wardrobe with its timeless, minimalistic design.

From high-intensity workouts to yoga, this top gives you the coverage and support you need. With a tight cut that fits your body like a second skin and an eye-catching racerback, the tank top leaves you feeling cool and well dressed. 

The stretchy fabric is partly made with recycled materials and leaves you feeling dry, thanks to the AEROREADY moisture-wicking fabric. Lasercut details along the front and back show off your shape and provide extra ventilation things get sweaty.

name: Daily Run Print 7/8 Leggings
description:
Know the carbon footprint of these running leggings.Lightweight, form-fitting, functional. The best running leggings are those you barely feel and that won't slip down when you're in motion. These printed leggings from adidas provide go-to support and a smooth, sleek sensation that lets you focus on your miles. They're soft and stretchy, with moisture-absorbing AEROREADY technology and an adjustable high-rise waistband. The slip-in phone pocket holds your device while you move. 

For real change to happen, we need to accelerate towards decarbonization. To do that we first need to understand the impact we are already making so we can improve and have a bar to raise.

From raw material extraction, processing, packaging, all the way to the end of product's life, we measured the carbon footprint (CO2e) of this product, conforming to an internationally recognized standard: ISO 14067.

name: Break the Norm Graphic Tee (Gender Neutral)
description:
A tee made in part with Parley Ocean Plastic.Running isn't just movement, it's a mindset. This graphic tee spells out what you're all about with an oversized adidas Running graphic on the back and a smaller version on the chest. Whatever your story, you'll appreciate its clean and simple design and comfortable build. This tee was made using UNITEFIT — an all-gender fit system that was created with a spectrum of sizes, genders and forms in mind.

This garment is made with a yarn which contains 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. This garment contains at least 70% recycled content in total.

name: PowerImpact Training Medium-Support Bra
description:
A soft and stretchy racerback bra for all the ways you play.Power up your workout in the PowerImpact Training Medium-Support Bra. 

Designed for activities like training, volleyball, tennis and cycling, the versatile bra has a pullover racerback design, strap stabilizers and a wide band to keep it in place. Removable pads let you customize the coverage. Using sweat-wicking or absorbent materials, AEROREADY keeps you feeling dry — even in intense workouts. The bra also has a stylish allover embossed graphic to keep you looking as good as you feel. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Featherweight Shmoofoil Shorts (Gender Free)
description:
Lightened-up staple shorts with a touch of imagination by Mark Gonzales.Created with adidas Skateboarding team rider Mark Gonzales, the Featherweight Shmoofoil Shorts lighten up a classic silhouette with a 300-gram French terry construction, button-and-drawstring waist, dual side and back pockets, custom artwork by The Gonz, and finished with a unique garment wash. These shorts were made using UNITEFIT — an all-gender fit system that was created with a spectrum of sizes, genders and forms in mind. 

Our cotton products support more sustainable cotton farming.

name: Yoga Studio Luxe 7/8 Leggings
description:
Leggings made in part with a blend of recycled and renewable materials.Feel confident during every yoga, barre, or studio session in the Yoga Studio Luxe 7/8 Leggings. 

Designed for controlled body movements — the tights minimize distraction so you can focus on your breathing instead. Stretch, bend, and lunge in total comfort thanks to a buttery-soft fabric and a high-rise waist. Made to adapt to your movement, the fabric is sumptuous and stretchy, while the smooth contour seaming flatters your shape. Muted colors provide a sense of calm. 

A minimum of 70% of this product is a blend of recycled and renewable materials.

name: Own the Run Running Tank Top
description:
A slim-fit running tank top with reflectivity, made for everyday running.Whether you're hitting the pavement with your community or on your own, there's nothing quite like the joyful rush of a runner's high. Crafted from lightweight fabric and cut for a slim fit, the top features sweat-wicking AEROREADY technology to help keep you feeling dry. Mesh panels on the back and sides keep things breezy, while the racerback design allows for easy movement as you put in the kms. The tank is finished with reflective details that shine in low light.

The high-rise waist stays put, so you can move with confidence, and moisture-absorbing AEROREADY helps you feel dry. With only the bare minimum of seams, they feel extra smooth.

name: CoreFlow Studio Medium-Support Bra

AEROREADY absorbs moisture, and removable pads let you choose your level of coverage.

name: adidas by Stella McCartney TrueStrength Long Sleeve Top
description:
A luxe, seamless crop top for yoga with a 'second-skin' feel."This adidas by Stella McCartney collection revisits iconic designs with a mix of form-fitting, super stretchy pieces and baggier silhouettes. The confidence-enhancing range is in tune with the everyday lives of busy modern women. Stylish cut-out details, muted tones and peach-soft fabrics combine for pieces that seamlessly transition from the studio to the city and beyond. 

The adidas by Stella McCartney Long Sleeve Crop Top is the chicest incentive there is to sign up for a Yoga or Pilates class. Designed for a flattering second-skin fit, the top is rendered in a fashion-forward, muted color palette for maximum versatility. The unbelievably soft material and seamless design enhance comfort and mobility — whether you're stretching it out in class or heading to brunch afterwards. "

The tight-fitting bra features adjustable straps and a sports luxe racer-back silhouette for enhanced versatility and mobility while you're on the move. The sweat-wicking fabric is a welcome salve during particularly hardcore sessions, while the chic design and iconic lines make it as fashion-forward as it is functional. Padded cups offer confident coverage at all times. Remember: the asset is you.

name: HIIT HEAT.RDY Training 2-in-1 Shorts
description:
Two-in-one workout tights made in part with recycled materials.Every interval gets you closer to that post-workout adrenaline rush. Tap into your power and push through HIIT class with confidence in these adidas two-in-one shorts. Attached inner shorts fit snug and let you move freely. HEAT.RDY sheds heat and moisture, keeping your head in the game.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Ultimate365 Tour Sleeveless Primeknit Polo Shirt

The sleeveless build keeps you cool and comfortable under pressure, and the refined design elevates your look on and off the course.

name: adidas x Parley Tee (Gender Neutral)
description:
A loose-fit allover print t-shirt made in collaboration with Parley for the Oceans.You and nature are one in this soft adidas t-shirt. Its unique allover print takes cues from coral bleaching, highlighting the beauty and fragility of the underwater world that surrounds us. The words printed on the back inspire you and others to protect Mother Nature every chance you get. This tee was made using UNITEFIT — an all-gender fit system that was created with a spectrum of sizes, genders and forms in mind.

Educate and act. Head to Parley for the Oceans website to find out more, sign up and get involved at adidas.com/parley.

The high-support bra is crafted from smooth, slick adiflex fabric that feels cool to the touch. Sweat-wicking AEROREADY keeps you feeling dry, while wide, padded straps distribute weight evenly with a comfortable finish. The hook-and-eye closure makes for easy on-and-off.

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future. 

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products, however, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source." 

Find out more here: bettercotton.org/learnmore

name: Hoop York City Pinned Shorts (Plus Size)
description:
adidas x Hoop York City shorts made in part with recycled content.These adidas shorts are a collaboration with Hoop York City, a basketball community that's on a mission to close the gender gap and give women the chance to hoop together. The comfortable fit is ideal for kicking back after you put in work on the hardwood. The graphic on the leg shows your B-ball status.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.

name: 3-Stripes Long Sleeve Swim Top
description:
A long sleeve swim top made for full coverage.When coverage is a priority, reach for this adidas long sleeve swim top. Inner bust support with removable padding provides support and a secure feeling. Inner buttons at the hip give you the option to attach it to the matching pants so it stays in place as you move. The Infinitex Fitness Eco fabric is chlorine resistant and made with recycled materials.

This garment is made of chlorine-resistant fabric that features ECONYL® regenerated yarn.

name: CoreFlow Medium-Support Bra
description: A strappy, supportive bra made in part with recycled materials.This adidas bra isn't about restrictions. It's all about freedom and helping you stay grounded in your practice. Super-soft Adisoft adapts to your body to bring comfort and confidence to every fold, twist and stretch. AEROREADY takes care of moisture, so you stay cool and dry from start to finish.
color: Silver Violet S23 / Silver Dawn S23

name: Go-To Piqué Sleeveless Golf Polo Shirt
description: A golf shirt to keep you cool, made with a blend of recycled and renewable materials.When the heat is on, keep your cool in this adidas golf polo shirt. It's made of a doubleknit material with plenty of stretch to let you swing without restrictions. Soft brrr° knit has a triple chill effect thanks to cooling minerals, moisture-wicking fibers and a quick-drying feel. The elongated hem lets you keep your shirt tucked as you swing or bend down to pick up the ball.

name: New York City FC 23/24 Home Jersey
description:
A fan-focused NYCFC home jersey made with recycled materials.Next stop? Soccer glory. The intricate, mosaic-style design on the front of this adidas NYCFC jersey takes inspiration from the ceramic work in New York City's world-famous subway stations. Built from soft fabric, the shirt includes a woven team crest and moisture-absorbing AEROREADY to keep fans proud and comfortable. That Lady Liberty torch signs off in style just above the hem.

Made with 100% recycled materials, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Power AEROREADY 2-in-1 Shorts
description:
Two-in-one training shorts made in part with recycled materials.Close your eyes and will yourself the energy to push through the toughest workouts. These adidas shorts make sure nothing stands in your way. The inner shorts support your muscles and have bonded seams to reduce chafing. The outer shorts are made with a stretchy, satiny fabric for a barely there feel that goes wherever you do. Both layers feature AEROREADY to keep you dry and focused on your goals.

Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Future Icons Badge of Sport Tee
description:
A relaxed-fit t-shirt that's a future classic.Like the style, love the work ethic. This adidas t-shirt has a simple, loose shape and adidas Badge of Sport that you can wear year-round and will still look fresh. It's made from cotton jersey fabric that stays soft and holds its shape. So put it through its paces, and pair it with any pants you like. 

Our cotton products support more sustainable cotton farming.

name: Racerback Sleeveless Polo Shirt
description:
A sporty golf polo shirt made in part with Parley Ocean Plastic.Bring a modern look to your afternoon round. This adidas golf polo shirt has a racerback design for sporty style. The stretchy build and side hem vents ensure full mobility on the course. The sport collar with a half zip finishes the look. 

This garment is made with a yarn which contains 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. This garment contains at least 40% recycled content in total.

name: Marathon 20 Running Shorts (Plus Size)
description:
Running shorts for daily training, made with recycled materials.Training for any race, whether a 5K or a marathon, takes dedication. These adidas running shorts are there for your journey. The slim, lightweight build includes a mesh brief for added coverage and breathable comfort. AEROREADY absorbs moisture to keep you dry. Stash your key in the secure pocket and focus on the road ahead.

Made with 100% recycled materials, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

The mid-rise fit is finished with an elastic waist, meaning you'll never need to tug or readjust mid-workout. Cut specifically for freedom of movement, they move with you while flattering your form. An allover abstract floral print blooms a burst of personality right into your look.

This running tank top is made to be remade.The skies are clear and the track is calling. Slip into this adidas running tank top, then head for your daily escape. The engineered knit fabric has a subtle camouflage design and AEROREADY to keep you dry and in the zone.

description:

name: St. Louis CITY SC Pride Pre-Match Jersey
description:
An expressive St. Louis CITY SC jersey made with recycled materials.Let love be your legacy. South African designer Rich Mnisi once wrote that reminder in a handwritten letter to his younger queer self, and today it thrives at the core of the adidas x Rich Mnisi Pride Collection. A celebration of self-expression, imagination, and the unwavering belief that love unites, the collaboration explores fluidity, color, and patterns. This partnership is one part of our effort to honor the LGBTQIA+ community alongside our Global Purpose partner Athlete Ally.

Stand out exactly how you are in a soccer jersey that shows your support for St. Louis CITY SC. Moisture-absorbing AEROREADY makes it perfect for taking onto the field.

Made with 100% recycled materials, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

description:
A Union jersey created for fan comfort and made with recycled materials.Show whose side you're on when Philadelphia Union steps onto rivals' territory. For fans following their team on the road, moisture-absorbent AEROREADY and smooth fabric make it a pleasure to pull on. If you're missing the full crest, it's on the back neck.

name: City Break Crop Tank Top
description:
A stylish, lightweight tank top made in part with recycled materials.Get ready for scorching temperatures. This adidas tank top is light and stretchy to keep you comfortable as the weather heats up. Whether you're jetting away for the weekend or just getting out in the sunshine, this figure-hugging top works with just about everything in your wardrobe. Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: adidas Aeroimpact Training Light-Support Bra
description: An adjustable sports bra made in part with recycled materials.Do Pilates, they said. It's a nice light workout. They forgot to mention that you don't need to move much to sweat up a storm. AEROREADY in this adidas light-support bra manages moisture as you crank up your core. The racerback design and breathable mesh back panel keep cool air flowing in.

name: TERREX Multi Tee
description: A versatile hiking tee made with recycled materials.Hike. Run. Explore. Your options are wide open with this adidas Terrex tee. It's the tech shirt that's ready for anything you are. AEROREADY manages moisture to keep you feeling dry, comfortable and focused through extended efforts. Offset shoulder seams reduce chafing under a backpack, and an extended back hem adds coverage as you bend, move and reach. Reflective details increase low light visibility.

name: Houndstooth Jacket
description: A houndstooth bomber jacket that exudes elegance.No matter how it's styled, houndstooth always brings in an air of elegance. Which doesn't mean it can't have edge. This adidas jacket proves that. It's taken over by the classic checkered print, played against another classic — the track silhouette. The look can go in multiple directions from here. Sophisticated, with more minimalist choices. Or go for a full clash of patterns and colors. With houndstooth as a foundation, you can't go wrong with any option.

name: Mission Victory Loose Fit Full-Zip Hoodie
description:
Thoughtful details make this relaxed hoodie a practical choice.Athletes are always pushing. With its functional design, this adidas hoodie is no different. It's made from comfy cotton and polyester doubleknit fabric, and it features an elongated back hem that's casual and flattering over workout leggings. It has a two-way zip that makes this top easy to loosen from the bottom — a bonus if biking is your thing. And it doesn't matter how many layers you're wearing, you'll always be able to reach your pant pockets. 

Our cotton products support more sustainable cotton farming.

name: adidas x FARM Rio Bike Shorts
description:
Tropically inspired bike shorts with a comfortable mid-rise fit.Whether for a light workout or hanging out at home, these adidas bike shorts bring the energy. They're decked out in an allover print designed in partnership with FARM Rio, a Brazil-based brand that celebrates vibrant color and positive vibes. The elastic waist has a mid-rise cut to keep you comfortable and feeling supported, and the stretchy cotton material stays soft, wear after wear. 

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future. 

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products, however, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source." 

Find out more here: bettercotton.org/learnmore
